@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.HKyMZobjOsd6WFuo]{Effect: Hurtful Critique}

Easily Misled.name: 易受误导 Easily Misled
Easily Misled.description: 洞穴巨魔在对抗欺骗检定时察觉DC承受-4环境减值。

Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Acid or.name: 再生20（酸蚀或音波使其无效） Regeneration 20 (Deactivated by Acid or Sonic)

Furious Throw.name: 狂暴投掷 Furious Throw
Furious Throw.description:
触发 洞穴巨魔受到酸蚀或音波伤害

效果 洞穴巨魔以第一个射程增量内一个随机生物为目标使用投石。如果洞穴巨魔受到持续酸蚀伤害，他尝试一次@Check[flat|dc:15]检定来移除它。

Sunlight Petrification.name: 阳光石化 Sunlight Petrification
Sunlight Petrification.description: 如果暴露在阳光直射下，洞穴巨魔会立即陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，且不能使用反动动作。每当洞穴巨魔在阳光下结束回合时，缓慢状态值加1。如果洞穴巨魔以此方式动作降为0，他将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]直到在黑暗中待够至少1分钟。类似@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]这类创造魔法阳光的法术不能石化洞穴巨魔，但巨魔会在暴露在此类效果之后陷入[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}的缓慢1。

Rock Tunneler.name: 穿岩者 Rock Tunneler
Rock Tunneler.description: 洞穴巨魔可以用10尺速度掘地穿越岩石。如果愿意，他可以留下一条隧道。

Cavern Troll.name: 洞穴巨魔 Cavern Troll
Cavern Troll.publicNotes:
这些贪得无厌的食腐者行走在幽暗地域（the Darklands）那永恒的黑暗之中，洞穴巨魔吞食着其行进道路上的一切——甚至包括岩石和矿物。这些岩石巨人可以用他们那如铁般锋利的爪子挖穿石头。尽管他们对于阳光的弱点，会令他们在持续接触后石化，但饥饿的洞穴巨魔仍常被相对富饶的地面世界吸引。即便石化后，这些无法移动的巨魔常被误认为巨石或其他自然景观，待夜幕再度降临便能继续狩猎。随着洞穴巨魔年龄增长，他们坚硬的皮肤上会布满各种各样的小型水晶和石头。其族裔中的佼佼者在其长满牙齿的嘴里有着巨大的水晶状尖牙。

巨魔是张着流涎的巨口，有着剃刀般锋利爪子的高大蛮兽，贪婪的掠食者。他们与土地的联结不仅能重建躯体，更催生出无数变种，每种巨魔都映射着它们汲取能量的地形特征。迁徙至新领地的巨魔会随着身体各部位的再生而逐渐蜕变，新生的血肉与旧躯缠绕交织，最终导致畸形的生长。

Whisper Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).name: 古低语龙施法者 Whisper Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster)
Whisper Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).publicNotes: 低语龙是敏锐的谣言和秘密收藏家，花费几个世纪来磨练他们的信息网络和人际关系。它们这样做通常并非出于想要控制他人或利用这些信息来进行阴谋，而仅仅是因为学习和收集信息的过程本身就是一种满足。与其他龙的财宝相比，它们的巢穴较为简陋，因为它们真正的财富——秘密——都藏在它们的脑海中。

Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.name: 法术效果：心灵屏匿 Hidden Mind
Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.description:
效果来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.C2w3YfBKjIRS07DP]

你在对抗心灵效果的豁免上获得+4状态加值。

+2 to Sense Motive.name: 察言观色时+2 +2 to Sense Motive

Information Network.name: 信息网络 Information Network
Information Network.description: 低语龙可以尝试一个社群检定来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]以代替搜集信息检定，从先前的线人处回忆情报。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Occult.name: 对抗异能的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Occult

Diplomatic Solution.name: 外交解决 Diplomatic Solution
Diplomatic Solution.description:
触发 低语龙进行先攻检定

效果 低语龙将其视线内60尺范围内的所有敌人作为目标，施放环级等于低语龙等级一半（向上取整）的安定心神（@Check[will|dc:35]豁免）。低语龙无需维持此效果，但如果低语龙对受到影响的生物采取任何敌对行动，则对所有生物终止该效果。

Distracting Whisper.name: 干扰低语 Distracting Whisper
Distracting Whisper.description:
触发 低语龙成为攻击的目标

效果 一个神秘的声音在触发生物耳边低语，使触发攻击受到-2环境减值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.qsvSWxRqVQofjDdH]

Cogitation Breath.name: 凝思吐息 Cogitation Breath
Cogitation Breath.description: 低语龙释放出一股迷惑性毒雾，在@Template[type:cone|distance:50]范围内造成@Damage[15d6[mental]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[will|dc:37|basic|options:area-effect,inflicts:stupefied]豁免）。豁免失败的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}（大失败则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}），持续1分钟。低语龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Cogitation Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用凝思吐息。

Steal Knowledge.name: 窃取知识 Steal Knowledge
Steal Knowledge.description:
低语龙从60尺内一个生物的意识中摘取知识片段，选择一个技能作为影响目标。该生物必须进行@Check[will|dc:35]豁免。

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 在接下来的1分钟内，该生物使用该技能的检定时承受-1状态减值，而低语龙在使用该技能的检定中获得+1状态加值。

大失败 同失败，但减值为-2，加值为+2。

Thought Whispers.name: 思想低语 Thought Whispers
Thought Whispers.description:
频率 每分钟一次

效果 低语龙将自己的心灵扩展以探知他人的思想，对60尺内所有生物使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]（@Check[will|dc:37]豁免）。

Unveil Secret.name: 揭开秘密 Unveil Secret
Unveil Secret.description: 低语龙探知60尺内一个生物的思维，搜寻其秘密，除非目标通过@Check[will|dc:37]豁免，否则低语龙会知晓一个该生物会觉得尴尬或羞耻的事情。目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，且在1分钟内或在低语龙揭露秘密前无法降低惊惧状态。当受影响生物尝试检定时，低语龙可用一个反应动作揭露其秘密使其难堪，迫使该生物投掷两次并取较差结果；这是一个厄运效果。

Sportlebore Swarm.name: 拟餐虫群 Sportlebore Swarm
Sportlebore Swarm.publicNotes:
一群拟餐虫比单独一只虫子要危险得多。

拟餐虫，这些可以拟态成可口食物的邪恶害虫是全世界饥饿的冒险家们的灾难。当位于像是水果或是肉干之类的赶路干粮周边时，一只拟餐虫能通过折叠，扭曲，变色自身的腹部以完美地模拟这些食物，并折叠胸腔，头部，以及腿部藏至它那看起来很鲜美的身体内。一旦被食用，拟餐虫会繁殖成饥饿的虫群，并被生病的食用者吐出，贪婪地攻击任何它们认为可以被吃掉的东西。

Sportlebore Infestation.name: 拟餐虫感染 Sportlebore Infestation
Sportlebore Infestation.description:
豁免骰 @Check[fortitude|dc:22]

阶段1 携带者无症状（1日）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1小时）

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}（1小时）

阶段4 @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:25|basic]豁免）与此同时宿主痛苦地呕吐出一团拟餐虫群并回到阶段1。

Pour Down Throat.name: 冲入喉咙 Pour Down Throat
Pour Down Throat.description:
触发 一名生物在拟餐虫群占据范围内说话，施放法术或是张开他的嘴巴

效果 一部分拟餐虫群尝试涌入触发此效果生物的喉咙，他必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:25]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物满嘴都是拟餐虫。他吐出了虫子并避免了进一步受伤，但他在一轮内无法说话，如果他正在进行施放法术动作，法术失败并且施法者浪费施法动作。

失败 生物受到来自拟餐虫啃咬的@Damage[4d6[piercing]]伤害，在一轮内无法说话，并且如成功般失去法术。

大失败 如同失败，但此生物同时暴露在拟餐虫感染的影响下。

Swarming Bites.name: 虫群撕咬 Swarming Bites
Swarming Bites.description: 在拟餐虫群占据范围内的全部生物受到@Damage[3d6[piercing]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）

Adaptive Defenses.name: 适应防御 Adaptive Defenses
Adaptive Defenses.description: 当受伤时，索瓦斯-卡的身体会进行适应性调整，确保触发因素无法再次伤害它。在承受伤害的瞬间，它对该伤害类型变为免疫。它能够以此法对三种伤害类型变为免疫，新获得的免疫会取代旧的免疫。

Bleed Destruction.name: 流血毁灭 Bleed Destruction
Bleed Destruction.description:
触发 索瓦斯-卡受到物理伤害

效果 琥珀之血从索瓦斯-卡的伤口喷涌而出，在与索瓦斯-卡相邻的一个方格中创造一处血泊。血液会留存在该区域直到被移除或自然干涸，这通常需要1天时间。

Slumbering Armageddon.name: 沉眠末日 Slumbering Armageddon
Slumbering Armageddon.description:
索瓦斯-卡的沉睡加速了侵蚀与风化，其作用时机总是精准使得岩崩、地陷、树木倒伏及其他坍塌达到临界点。

洛瓦古格之嗣能在再生的休眠中沉睡数个世纪。沉睡期间，子嗣无需进食、饮水甚至呼吸，且所有抗力数值翻倍。它无法被侦测、揭示或探知效果定位，并且它的所有豁免检定结果使用比实际结果高一级成功度。当子嗣沉睡时，其巨大的毁灭能量无处宣泄，向外蔓延侵蚀周遭环境，导致其栖身之所周围1英里弥漫范围内，与子嗣相匹配类型的自然灾害将更频繁、更剧烈地发生，且每沉睡十年，灾害的半径便扩大约1英里。

Absolute Regeneration.name: 绝对再生 Absolute Regeneration
Absolute Regeneration.description:
索瓦斯-卡的再生可以通过使用彻默西特（Chemnosit），科索伽兹（Kothogaz） ，乌伦那忒（Ulunat），沃纳古尔（Volnagur）和佐坦尼（Xotani）的骨头制成的武器杀死它来失效。

如同再生，但需要极特定的动作才能使其失效。洛瓦古格之嗣的再生强大到即便其被死亡效果杀死也能让它复活。如果子嗣在对抗某种会立即杀死它的效果时豁免失败，它会在死亡3轮后以1点生命值复活。子嗣仍然可以被放逐，禁锢，或传送等方式以保全一个区域，或借助造成常驻伤害的效果使其保持在濒死状态。

Reactive.name: 敏锐反应 Reactive
Reactive.description: 索瓦斯-卡每轮获得3个反应动作。它仍然只能对每次触发使用一个反应动作。

Amber Strikes.name: 琥珀打击 Amber Strikes
Amber Strikes.description:
需求 索瓦斯-卡的上个动作是一次对目标的成功打击

效果 打击命中后，索瓦斯-卡命令其血液继续进攻，从下列三种选项中选择一种：结晶，注入，溅射。如果上次攻击是重击，琥珀打击变为一个自由动作。

  • 结晶 Crystallize 索瓦斯-卡的血液在目标肢体周围流动后凝固硬化。该生物必须成功通过一次@Check[reflex|dc:48]豁免，否则将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]，直到其逃脱。若该生物正在飞行，则会坠落。
  • 注入 Inject 索瓦斯-卡的血液通过目标的伤口侵入其体内。目标必须通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:48]豁免，否则将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}（大失败时@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}）。只要目标处于恶心状态，索瓦斯-卡的血液将尝试反制任何能恢复目标生命值的效果（反制等级10环级，反制调整值[[/r 1d20+38 #Counteract]]{+38}）。
  • 溅射 Splash 索瓦斯-卡之血猛烈飞溅，使目标陷入目眩至其下回合结束，并在与目标相邻一格创造一处血泊。

Detonate Blood.name: 引爆血液 Detonate Blood
Detonate Blood.description:
需求 一处索瓦斯-卡的血泊位于500尺内

效果 索瓦斯-卡的血液爆裂成结晶琥珀飞镖。需求的血泊所处方格内或该血泊@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]范围内除了索瓦斯-卡的每个生物受到@Damage[20d8[piercing]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:48|basic]豁免）。大失败时，生物拥有的任何物理伤害抗力减少10，持续1分钟。

Rough Rampage.name: 粗鲁拖拽 Rough Rampage
Rough Rampage.description:
需求 索瓦斯-卡使至少一个生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]

效果 索瓦斯-卡行走，拖拽任何受擒或束缚于它的生物。每个受擒或束缚的生物受到@Damage[11d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:48|basic]豁免）。失败时，目标还将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}（大失败时候为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3}），直到其逃脱。

Sorvuth-Ka.name: 索瓦斯-卡 Sorvuth-Ka
Sorvuth-Ka.publicNotes:
索瓦斯-卡是洛瓦古格之嗣中最年轻的一只。它从未被目睹进食；与其他子嗣饥肠辘辘的模样不同，它似乎纯粹为乐趣而毁灭，每次攻击都带着新奇而富有创造性的残忍。索瓦斯-卡摧毁城镇时或许会稍作停顿，给民众留下逃亡的喘息之机，然而当人们绝望地发现唯一的逃生通道已被它坍塌的山道封死时，一切已为时已晚。不过这生物极易厌倦，若游戏进程偏离计划或耗时过久，它便会迅速挥动利刃般的肢体了结猎物。

奇怪的是，尽管索瓦斯-卡的再生能力——即使以子嗣的标准而言也极为强大，能使其对已经伤害过它的攻击产生抗力——但它身上仍有数处伤口无法愈合，最显著的是横贯面部的巨大裂口。有学者推测这些伤痕是洛瓦古格的残酷设计，旨在更好地获取琥珀之血，这正是索瓦斯-卡用于毁灭的主要手段。另一些人则视其为某种终结洛瓦古格之嗣威胁的终极武器存在的铁证。

尽管毁灭之神洛瓦古格如同困在琥珀中的苍蝇般被囚禁在行星的核心中，自创世之年起便被诸神联盟禁锢，但随着时光流逝，囚笼日渐衰弱，使其影响力得以渗透而出，化作名为洛瓦古格之嗣的活体灾厄。这些庞然巨物已肆虐格拉利昂多个纪元，其狂暴行径摧毁了群山，焦灼了沙漠，更用海洋填满大地上的巨坑。它们的再生能力使其成为永恒威胁，永远无法彻底消灭。这些完全的毁灭生物竟能对生命保持如此不灭的掌控力，成为学者们苦苦思索的悖论。有人认为每只子嗣都承载着父神赐福的微小碎片；另有人推测它们的不朽源于所造成的毁灭，每夺走一个生命的未来，便换取自身永恒的延续。

历史上关于子嗣袭击的记载存在一条奇特的脉络：每次袭击过后，该地区都会迎来一段短暂却显著的黄金时代。尽管多数人将此归因于抵御子嗣蹂躏所需的协作精神，但有人视之为扭曲的象征，这些生物实为"真正"和平的缔造者。这些信徒常组织邪教，执意召唤或复活任何近期被击杀的子嗣。

尽管许多子嗣已多年未现踪迹，但神祇古拉姆——死之库的最初缔造者之一——的陨落再度削弱了封印，令洛瓦古格的意志在格拉利昂各地掀起涟漪。仿佛作为回应，众多子嗣开始重现于世，令格拉利昂的领袖、学者与战士们惊惶不已。毕竟，若单个子嗣便足以酿成颠复时代的灾厄，需以军队为代价才能勉强遏制其破坏力，当所有子嗣同时苏醒时，又将引发何等难以想象的浩劫？

Praskith Venom.name: Praskith Venom
Praskith Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:21]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 clumsy 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

Rampant Growth.name: Rampant Growth
Rampant Growth.description:
Requirements A creature the praskith has Swallowed Whole has taken damage since the end of the praskith's last turn, and the praskith hasn't used any other actions this turn

Effect The praskith regains 3d8 Hit Points and recovers from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and slowed conditions. It reduces any enfeebled value it has by 2.

Praskith.name: Praskith
Praskith.publicNotes:
These strange amalgams of plant and fungus with animal tendencies form where the natural world is corrupted by foul magic or frayed planar boundaries. Praskiths are instinctive ambush predators who seek out lightly traveled forest paths and lie in wait in the undergrowth. A praskith swallows prey as quickly as possible and lets its paralytic digestive juices finish the meal, swiftly restoring itself with the nourishment provided by the trapped creature. When collected, neutralized, and refined, the digestive fluids of a praskith form a lacquer that retains some of the creature's acid resistance.

A praskith comes into being with a rudimentary understanding of the Fey language, but in some cases it might manifest knowing a different tongue, such as Aklo, Draconic, or even Necril. Regardless, praskiths have little patience for chattering with potential meals, though some determined fey and primal spellcasters have been known to form alliances or even closer bonds with praskiths. Befriending a praskith requires great patience and plentiful food—and gifts of food must be alive when handed over.

When finished feeding, a praskith slips into a quiescent state for a full day, one of the few times it's safe to approach. Upon rousing, it seeks the deep forest to regurgitate the less digestible portions of its meal. These remains can contain valuables that survived digestion and indicate that a praskith's hunting grounds lie nearby.

Praskiths dwell in deep woods and jungles. Well-fed praskiths develop fruiting bodies that cast forth millions of spores. Spores that happen to alight on carrion grow into new praskiths.

Bison.name: Bison
Bison.publicNotes:
Bison are large bovines with short faces and two horns; they weigh an upwards1 of 2,000 pounds and stand up to 6 feet at the withers. Bison herds thunder across the grassy plains of Golarion, shaking the earth. They're a common sight along the Whistling Plains east of Taldor and the wide grasslands of the nation of Karazh in Casmaron; they also frequently appear in the cooler northeastern reaches of Avistan, the River Kingdoms through Numeria, and the Realm of the Mammoth Lords and western Sarkoris.

Communal by nature, bison gather in large numbers for the summer mating season before the bulls split off to wander the prairie grasses. Bison have adapted well to harsh prairie winters, as their shaggy fur, which grows thicker in winter, insulates them; in the face of blizzards, they survive by facing steadfastly into the howling winds and hunkering down to reduce their exposure.

The way that bison wallow in dirt or rub against large stones might make it easy to mistake their docile nature for passivity. However, this presumption has been the ruin of many hunting parties. Their plentiful meat and thick furs make bison an appealing bounty, but with the ground thundering beneath them, bison can quickly overpower inexperienced hunters unprepared for a stampeding herd. These hunting parties sometimes hire particularly daring adventures, who can add their spells, steel, and expertise to ensure a successful hunt.

While the bison of the plains are the best known and most numerous, they have cousins both in thick boreal forests and along wide, open steppes. These bison variants stand taller but can't match the speed and aggression of their smaller plains relatives.

Cold Adaptation.name: Cold Adaptation
Cold Adaptation.description: The bison reduces the effects it suffers from cold environments by one step.

Pointed Charge.name: Pointed Charge
Pointed Charge.description: The bison surges forward at its foe, horns lowered. It Strides twice. If the bison ends its movement within melee range of an enemy, it makes a horn Strike against that enemy. This Strike gains the fatal d12 trait.

Rolling Thunder.name: Rolling Thunder
Rolling Thunder.description:
The bison kicks up dust and shakes the ground as it charges.

The stampeding bison Strides up to twice its Speed in a straight line, dealing @Damage[(4d6+6)[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:21|basic|options:area-effect] save) to any Medium or smaller creature in its path.

Multiple bison can participate in Rolling Thunder by spending this ability's actions and waiting to charge until the herd is ready. Before the beginning of their next turn, they can then charge as a reaction triggered by an adjacent bison beginning its Rolling Thunder charge. All bison in the combined charge must charge in parallel lines, so the areas can't overlap. The combined charge deals an additional @Damage[3d6[bludgeoning]] damage to creatures in the area, and a creature that fails the Reflex saving throw is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Spell Effect: See the Unseen.name: Spell Effect: See the Unseen
Spell Effect: See the Unseen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen}

You can see invisible creatures as though they weren't invisible, although their features are blurred, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and difficult to identify. You also gain a +2 status bonus to checks you make to disbelieve illusions.

Planar Sight.name: Planar Sight
Planar Sight.description: The eyes at the end of their tentacles allow a dibrasgorth to see into planes coterminous with the one it is currently on at the listed range. For instance, if they're in the Universe, they can see into the Ethereal Plane and the Netherworld.

Warped Space.name: Warped Space
Warped Space.description: 100 feet. The dibrasgorth's presence distorts the fabric of space. Any other creature who uses a teleportation effect or spell within the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Breath of Phantasms.name: Breath of Phantasms
Breath of Phantasms.description: The dibrasgorth exhales a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of noxious gas. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[7d6[poison]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:30|basic] save). On a failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round (or 2 rounds on a critical failure).

Drag Through Dimensions.name: Drag Through Dimensions
Drag Through Dimensions.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements The dibrasgorth has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} with a tentacle

Effect The dibrasgorth's tentacle whips through coterminous planes as it smashes the creature it is holding against the ground and other natural features in each plane before returning to this plane. The creature takes @Damage[5d8[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic] save). A creature who fails the save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} by the rapid planar travel.

Draining Bite.name: Draining Bite
Draining Bite.description: A dibrasgorth feeds on the spirits of its victims. A creature that is damaged by the dibrasgorth's jaws Strike must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:30] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} on a critical failure). In addition, the dibrasgorth gains 10 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute if the creature fails or critically fails the save.

Transdimensional Tentacles.name: Transdimensional Tentacles
Transdimensional Tentacles.description: The dibrasgorth can worm its tentacles through nearby planes to attack. While in the Universe, its tentacle Strikes ignore all cover from objects unless those objects exist on both the Universe and either the Netherworld or the Ethereal Plane, or the objects have the extradimensional trait.

Slow Metabolism.name: 代谢缓慢 Slow Metabolism
Slow Metabolism.description: 湖怪可以在不进食的情况下存活10年。超出此限制后，湖怪的饥饿就会让他陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，但这并不会影响他的寿命。由于饥饿而陷入缓慢的湖怪可以通过使用活吞进食来移除该状态。

Undetectable.name: 难以侦测 Undetectable
Undetectable.description: 湖怪会自动反制任何对他进行的侦测、揭示或探知的预言尝试，使用他的隐秘调整值来进行反制检定。

Water Travel.name: 水中游弋 Water Travel
Water Travel.description: 湖怪能融入水体，仅呈现出一条狭长的暗色蛇形的水域。在处于该形态时，湖怪的游泳速度增加至600尺，在用于游泳的运动检定中自动成功，在水中进行的隐秘检定获得+4环境加值。湖怪能够在该形态中持续8小时，但在使用该能力时无法进入盐水水域。湖怪可以通过解消此动作来恢复成正常的形态。

Water Orm.name: 湖怪 Water Orm
Water Orm.publicNotes:
名为湖怪的传说生物潜伏于偏远的湖泊中，他们总是能以某种方式成为湖畔社区的酒馆传说。对一些旅行者来说，每座规模较大的湖泊似乎都会被城镇环绕，且镇上到处都是声称目击过湖怪的渔民。这些难以琢磨的生物主要栖息在湖泊中凉爽幽暗的地区。有些人声称湖怪是海蛇和蛇龙的某种分支，但在人们已经发现的这些生物之间并未找到足够让人信服的联系。

湖怪具有许多海蛇不具备的特征，比如能够理解简单的语言。他们避免与外界产生接触且时刻隐藏自身的本性有时会与同样强烈的好奇心产生冲突，想要窥视湖畔的人们。当湖怪没能忍耐住，想要浮上湖面窥探位于湖岸边或者漂浮在水面上的不同寻常的某人（或某物）时，人们就会目击到湖怪。

这些生物的寿命极长，可以活数十年或者甚至数个世纪，而且食量很小。这使得湖怪可以在不浮上水面的前提下在湖泊中存活多年，即便身处缺乏充足食物来源的淡水水体中也是如此。湖怪可能会在湖床的淤泥中躺上数年，湖怪那难以捉摸的秉性只会让他们那传说中的名声变得更大。当有宠物或儿童在湖泊附近失踪时，就会有传闻说是被本地湖怪抓走了，进而产生民间传说警告居民们不要独自在湖水旁边探险。

大多数湖怪被描绘为蛇形或者颈部很长的爬行动物，但也有一部分看起来像是拉长了的怪异海豹或鲸鱼、大得不可思议的海马、或者颈部很长且生长着类似板龙（elasmosauruses）的桨状器官。

House Drake.name: 小巢龙 House Drake
House Drake.publicNotes:
这些被称为小巢龙的小龙身披紫色与电蓝色华彩，在各方面都展现出非凡的才华。它们活泼且友好，虽然它们有着长期帮助施法者的传统，但它们更愿意被视为平等的伙伴，而非宠物。它们非常聪明，并且不喜欢那些将它们当作简单动物来对待的人表现出优越感。

这些小型龙类在传统的瓦瑞西亚故事中已经出现了几个世纪，但"小巢龙"这一新名称的出现则相对较晚。这个名称源自科瓦萨市，在这里，小巢龙尤其适应了城市生活。当魔法学校"魔学院"中的学徒们未能完成学业，导致他们的小鬼魔宠四处乱窜时，这些小龙发现自己在与它们作斗争时非常得心应手。两种生物在狡猾上不相上下。尽管它们的冲突通常从彼此智斗开始，但常常以屋顶和小巷中的混乱打斗结束。科瓦萨的居民既欣赏小巢龙提供的保护，又喜欢它们迷人的外貌和举止。因此，小巢龙的数量在科瓦萨繁荣昌盛，比世界上任何其他地方都要常见。

小巢龙有着独特的梳理习惯，常常用银币或小珠宝磨锐牙齿。因此，它们的咬合和呼气中会带有银质颗粒。除此之外，它们是肉食性的，吃小型动物和小鸟。尽管小巢龙能自己猎食，许多小巢龙觉得这有些乏味，乐意接受食物捐赠，宁愿将时间花在其他事情上。然而，要真正赢得小巢龙的好感，赠送一份银制礼物是必不可少的。科瓦萨的居民已经形成了定期向小巢龙捐赠食物的习惯，以至于"最近给龙兽送过东西吗？"这句话成了形容某人有些轻信和心软的常用语。这些捐赠纯粹是慈善行为。小巢龙避免任何类似工作的事情，因它们自豪于自己的独立性，并且能够选择如何度过自己的时间。

Ferocious Will.name: 凶暴意志 Ferocious Will
Ferocious Will.description:
触发 小巢龙成功通过对魔法心灵效果的豁免

效果 小巢龙对效果源释放魔法反冲，对该生物造成@Damage[2d6[mental]]伤害（@Check[will|dc:16|basic]豁免）。如果豁免失败，该生物还会在1轮内陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Silver Breath.name: 银雾吐息 Silver Breath
Silver Breath.description: 小巢龙喷出@Template[type:cone|distance:10]银色雾气。雾气中的每个生物必须成功通过@Check[will|dc:16]豁免，否则在1轮内陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}。小巢龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Silver Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用银雾吐息。

Silver Strike.name: 银牙 Silver Strike
Silver Strike.description: 小巢龙用银制饰品磨尖牙齿，直到牙齿中蕴含银质碎片。它的颚攻击算作银制武器。

Pyre Breath.name: 烈焰吐息 Pyre Breath
Pyre Breath.description: 灰烬龙喷吐出一股灼热烈焰，在@Template[type:cone|distance:60]范围内造成@Damage[18d6[fire]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:41|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。豁免大失败的生物会着火，受到@Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]]伤害。随后该区域被黑烟笼罩1分钟，效果与薄雾相同，但仅覆盖该锥形区域。灰烬龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Pyre Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用烈焰吐息。

Smoke Vision.name: 烟雾视觉 Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: 烟雾不会妨碍灰烬龙的视觉；它能无视由烟雾造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]状态。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal.name: 对抗原能的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal

Boiling Blood.name: 沸血 Boiling Blood
Boiling Blood.description:
触发 灰烬龙被一次近战攻击重击

效果 灰烬龙的高热之血飞溅至攻击者。该目标受到@Damage[10d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:41|basic]豁免）。

Reactive Strike (Jaws only).name: 反应打击（仅颚咬） Reactive Strike (Jaws only)

All Becomes Flame.name: 万象化焰 All Becomes Flame
All Becomes Flame.description:
灰烬龙诅咒60尺内的一个生物，使其魔法被原初火焰替代。目标必须进行@Check[will|dc:39]豁免。无论结果如何，目标会暂时免疫此能力1天。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标被诅咒1轮。诅咒期间，目标所造成的任何伤害，无论原始伤害类型为何，都会变为火焰伤害。被诅咒的目标可以使用一个动作临时压制诅咒1轮。

失败 如成功，但诅咒持续时间为1小时。

大失败 如成功，但诅咒持续时间为1天。

Stoke the Flames.name: 煽燃烈焰 Stoke the Flames
Stoke the Flames.description: 灰烬龙激化周围的火势。所有在60尺范围内并正承受持续火焰伤害的敌人，额外受到@Damage[5d6[fire]]伤害。

Cinder Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).name: 古灰烬龙施法者 Cinder Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster)
Cinder Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).publicNotes: 在所有龙类之中，灰烬龙体型最为庞大，亦是最为凶猛的种类之一。它们通常性情暴躁易怒，要求他者给予敬畏——乃至臣服。灰烬龙的外貌正如其体内的烈焰，鳞片上常呈现红、橙、黄交错的火焰纹理。许多灰烬龙居住在活火山或其他同样炽热的地域之中。它们偏爱那些能承受高温的宝藏，因此宝石、黄金与白银常见于其囤积的财宝中。

Arboreal Archive.name: Arboreal Archive
Arboreal Archive.publicNotes:
Arboreal archives are solitary beings typically found in the remote wilderness. These ancient monoliths hold the memories of their vast territories, keeping mental records of the passing seasons of the world around them. Their knowledge of humanoid affairs varies, as they find quickly shifting political situations difficult to comprehend, but through fungal networks, reports from arboreal wardens, and other woodland chatter, arboreal archives learn of each storm, drought, or logging threat encountered throughout their long years. They primarily observe and record rather than interfere, but they willingly offer wisdom to those who respectfully seek them out. Arboreal regents call upon archives for advice in times of strife, conferring on the best course of action to protect their realms.

It is rare for there to be more than one arboreal archive in a given region. When an archive senses they're nearing the end of their lengthy lifespan, a grove of regents gathers to nominate the wisest among them to become the next archive. After four seasons' deliberation, all arboreals in the area congregate to witness the succession ritual, during which the elder arboreal archive transfers their collected wisdom to the elected replacement before retiring.

Arboreals are tree-like ancient guardians of forests, nurturing new growth and maintaining a balanced ecosystem as if the vast wilderness were their garden. Arboreals are thoughtful and deliberate - until something threatens their realms and invites their wrath.

Abeyance Rift.name: Abeyance Rift
Abeyance Rift.description: If an arboreal archive dies unexpectedly before passing on their knowledge in a succession ritual, the amassed lore within their roots and boughs explodes out in a shock wave that deals @Damage[8d10[mental]|options:area-damage,inflicts:prone] damage to creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} (@Check[will|dc:32|basic|options:area-effect] save) before dissipating; those who fail also fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Axe Vulnerability.name: Axe Vulnerability
Axe Vulnerability.description: An arboreal archive takes 10 additional damage from axes.

Memory Maelstrom.name: Memory Maelstrom
Memory Maelstrom.description:
The arboreal archive tries to overwhelm foes with a surge of information it has absorbed over its long life. This surge deals @Damage[5d6[mental]|options:area-damage] damage to each enemy within @Template[emanation|distance:40]{40 feet}, who must attempt a @Check[will|dc:32|options:area-effect,damaging-effect,inflicts:stunned,inflicts:confused] save.

Critical Success The creature maintains its composure, takes no damage, and is temporarily immune to Memory Maelstrom for 1 minute.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for [[/gmr 2d4 #Confusion Duration]]{2d4 rounds}, and is stunned 3.

Propulsive Launch.name: Propulsive Launch
Propulsive Launch.description: The soulrider Leaps up to 40 feet, then makes a sucker Strike. If it's in the air and not attached to a creature after the Strike, it falls.

Soul Attach.name: Soul Attach
Soul Attach.description: When a soulrider succeeds at a sucker Strike against a target with a soul capable of facing judgment, its sucker attaches it to that soul. While attached, both the soulrider and the host creature are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, and the soulrider moves with its host until the soulrider dies or the host pulls it loose (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC 16). If the host dies while the soulrider is attached, the soulrider disappears immediately to follow the soul leaving the body. A creature returned to life before reaching its final destination generally returns with any attached soulrider.

Planar Adaptation (Celestial).name: Planar Adaptation (Celestial)
Planar Adaptation (Celestial).description: A spawning soulrider has traits appropriate to the planar energy it's absorbed: celestial and holy, fiend and unholy, or monitor.

Swim the Dead Roads.name: Swim the Dead Roads
Swim the Dead Roads.description: In a process that takes 1 week, a spawning soulrider can travel through channels in the multiverse only it can sense, moving from the Outer Sphere plane whose energy it has absorbed to the Dead Roads that connect the Boneyard to the mortal Universe. From there, it travels to a random place in the Universe that can support life.

Celestial Flare.name: Celestial Flare
Celestial Flare.description: Each enemy within 30 feet of the soulrider takes @Damage[2d6[spirit]] damage (@Check[will|dc:17|basic] save). Creatures that fail the save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round. The spawning soulrider can't use Celestial Flare again for 1 minute.

Grind Soul.name: Grind Soul
Grind Soul.description:
Requirements The spawning soulrider is attached to a creature's soul

Effect The soulrider grinds the creature's soul with its jagged inner mouth, dealing @Damage[2d8[spirit]] damage (@Check[will|dc:16|basic] save). On a critical failure, the creature also takes @Damage[1d4[persistent,spirit]] damage. Regardless of the result, the spawning soulrider is no longer attached to the creature.

Tail Thrash.name: Tail Thrash
Tail Thrash.description:
Requirements The soulrider is attached to a creature's soul

Effect The soulrider makes a tail Strike against the creature whose soul it's attached to, then one against another creature adjacent to the original target. These Strikes count towards the soulrider's multiple attack penalty, but it doesn't increase until after the second attack.

Spawning Soulrider (Celestial).name: Spawning Soulrider (Celestial)
Spawning Soulrider (Celestial).publicNotes:
When soulriders absorb sufficient planar energy, they become gravid with countless tiny eggs. Such soulriders instinctively return to the Universe via the Dead Roads to lay their spawn, although the exact metaphysical process has yet to be fully understood. Fiends and others keen to enter the mortal world have begun capturing and studying spawning soulriders, though such experiments carry their own risks, for soulriders prevented from returning to the Universe will continue to grow larger as they absorb more energy.

Once back in the Universe, spawning soulriders become fiercely protective of their near-translucent eggs and tiny spawn, using their remora-like maws to fend off potential threats. Anyone disturbing a soulrider in the process of spawning might find out what it feels like to have pieces of their soul torn away.

Resembling a lamprey or hagfish with a long whiplike tail, a soulrider uses its harmless sucker to hitch rides on a creature's soul. This seemingly simple connection transcends the physical, attaching directly to the host's soul and even riding along with the soul to its final destination. Once there, a soulrider leaves its host to absorb the surrounding planar energies, adapting to the new environment and growing large enough to produce spawn. However, it can only do so in the mortal Universe, so it must find a portal or other way to return. With this cycle, they've spread to every plane in the Outer Sphere, as well as many mortal worlds.

Although increasingly widespread, soulriders only appeared a little over a century ago. Thought to be a fleshwarper's attempt to cheat Pharasma's judgment by attaching several innocent souls to their own, soulriders' numbers have grown explosively since then.

Soulriders require little more than air to survive, but they're instinctually aware of their need for a mortal soul. Although their suckers are harmless, soulriders who feel threatened or become impatient will finish off their hosts or nearby threats with their tail.

Resurrection Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaste.name: 古复生龙施法者 Resurrection Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster)
Resurrection Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaste.publicNotes: 复生龙徘徊于生与死之间。它们精通命能，使得它们能够将死者复生，同时也精通虚能，能够赋予他人死亡。它们利用这些能力戏弄凡人的生命，召唤灵魂来帮助自己，或复生它们认为重要或有趣的生物。复生龙的巢穴通常是一个荒凉之地。虽然它们像其他龙一样囤积财富，但它们几乎不装饰自己的巢穴，财宝通常被存放在黑暗的角落里，仿佛它们对自己的财物毫不在乎。然而，复生龙倾向于保留从复生的生物或计划复生的生物那里得到的纪念物，而这些物品会特别安全地保管。

Reawaken!.name: 醒来！ Reawaken!
Reawaken!.description:
触发 复生龙能看到的一个活物死亡

效果 复生龙利用神术与生命能量将灵魂重新连接到已死躯壳。该自愿生物将以其最大生命值的一半的状态复活。每个生物只能被此能力复生一次。

Risen Commander.name: 复生指挥官 Risen Commander
Risen Commander.description: 复生龙与它的仆从有着强烈的联系，复生龙每回合可以用一个自由动作维持@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hghGRzOSzEl4UXdS]。

Siphon Life.name: 生命吸取 Siphon Life
Siphon Life.description:
触发 一个60尺内的生物使用了一个恢复生命值的治疗效果

效果 复生龙将命能从该效果中引导开，从而将其影响降到最低。触发恢复生命值效果的所有掷骰取最小值，并且任何恢复生命值的固定值（如两动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]的附加生命值）都会被减半。然后，复生龙获得3d8临时生命值，持续1轮。

Arise!.name: 重生！ Arise!
Arise!.description:
复生龙利用其对命能的精通将其灵魂投射到骨园，并将一个自愿生物的灵魂拉回到其躯体，整个过程需要1小时。这具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]的效果，但目标的最大等级为13级，且灵魂与复生龙的灵魂连接。一次只能有一个生物与复生龙的灵魂连接。如果目标与复生龙不在同一位面或复生龙死亡，则复生生物会死亡，且无法再用重生！能力复生。复生龙可以随时解消该连接。如此做并不会阻止复生龙再次对该生物使用重生！能力。

当以这种方式复生后，该生物仍然可以被死者复活、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]及类似效果选为目标。这会使其完全恢复生命，解除与复生龙的连接，并允许复生龙与另一个生物建立连接。

Necro Puppeteer.name: 死灵傀儡 Necro Puppeteer
Necro Puppeteer.description: 复生龙将能量注入一个60尺内它能看到的不死生物、濒死生物或尸体中。复生龙将目标生物移动30尺，并使其在@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]范围内释放一股虚能波动，造成@Damage[6d8[void]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。

Soul Siphoning Breath.name: 汲魂吐息 Soul Siphoning Breath
Soul Siphoning Breath.description: 复生龙释放一股神圣能量，在@Template[type:cone|distance:50]范围内造成@Damage[16d6[void]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:38|basic|options:area-effect]豁免），并从范围内的生物身上汲取生命之力。复生龙获得快速治疗15，直到其汲魂吐息重新充能。复生龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Soul Siphoning Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用汲魂吐息。

Elasmosaurus.name: Elasmosaurus
Elasmosaurus.publicNotes:
Elasmosauruses are long-necked, primeval reptiles that dwell in deep oceans and seas. Although not truly a dinosaur, elasmosauruses are often found in similar locations and are similarly titanic creatures. Keeping their massive bodies underwater, elasmosauruses use their long necks to catch prey and snorkel air to their massive lungs while remaining mostly hidden from the surface above. An elasmosaurus is 30 feet long and weighs 6,000 pounds.

As rare and reclusive as they are, elasmosauruses are sometimes mistaken for even rarer creatures called water orms, legendary aquatic denizens of remote lakes known for their elusiveness and craftiness. Whereas elasmosauruses are mundane creatures of animalistic intelligence, water orms are magical beings with near-humanoid intelligence and a curious fascination with mortals, and they seem to delight in confounding onlookers. As a result, it's theorized that a typical water orm is more than happy to lead a group of spectators to a lost elasmosaurus, both to throw its pursuers off its tail and for the hilarity that will inevitably ensue.

While elasmosauruses are often found in lost worlds and unsettled regions, those who dwell in the oceans of the world do not contain their hunting grounds to specific regions. As a result, it's not unheard of for a wandering specimen to find its way to coastal waters. Those that do often find the ports of small towns or even large cities to be wondrous banquets and are usually hunted down by coastal guards or adventurers. When a wayward elasmosaurus like this finds its way into a city's sewer system or reservoirs, though, it can become the stuff of urban legends.

Deep Breath.name: 深呼吸 Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: The elasmosaurus can hold its breath for 2 hours.

Long Neck.name: Long Neck
Long Neck.description: An elasmosaurus's long neck allows it to interact with the surface while its body remains submerged underwater. While submerged no deeper than 15 feet underwater, an elasmosaurus can still stick its head up to breathe. An elasmosaurus gains cover against attacks made against creatures that are above the water's surface while it is underwater, even if its head is above the surface.

Drag Below.name: Drag Below
Drag Below.description: The elasmosaurus attempts an Athletics check against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} foe's Fortitude DC. If the elasmosaurus succeeds, the foe is forcibly moved 5 feet toward the elasmosaurus's body. If the elasmosaurus critically succeeds, the foe is moved 10 feet toward the elasmosaurus's body.

Thrashing Retreat.name: Thrashing Retreat
Thrashing Retreat.description: A swimming elasmosaurus thrashes the area around it as it attempts to flee. It makes two paddle Strikes, each of which must be against separate targets, and each of which takes the normal multiple attack penalty. It then Swims up to its swim Speed. This Swim does not trigger reactions based on movement.

Pairaka.name: Pairaka
Pairaka.publicNotes:
Often charming, sometimes even seductive, pairakas worm their way into mortal relationships, subtly destroying all ties of friendship and love through emotional and physical manipulation and corruption. Their natural form is not often seen. Instead, they adopt shapes that attract just enough attention to earn the trust of those they wish to torment and corrupt. When they do show a more natural form, pairakas typically choose to feed into the belief of their beauty by appearing as androgynous, pale blue, aesthetically pleasing humanoids who carry themselves gracefully wherever they go.

While this form is only a part of their manipulative tactics, their intrinsic form is hidden to almost all except other pairakas. They're frightful, towering creatures, spotted with large rashes and boils. With horns that grow and twist with age, and a smile that bares razor-sharp teeth, this form is both shocking and unsettling. Pairakas may occasionally show their true form to those they've preyed upon, but only once they've been completely corrupted, with all their other relationships in ruins.

Some fiends want to tear down the multiverse; others dedicate themselves to creating chaos and carnage, or to rule over realms with an iron fist. Divs strive toward a different, if equally reprehensible, goal-they seek to thwart and ruin the schemes and works of mortal beings.

Long ago, divs were once genies bound to serve ancient mortal empires lost to the passage of eons. In the beginning, these genies were masters of creation, working alongside gracious mortal partners to create works of subtle design and powerful magical potential. What started as a collaboration with mortals soon morphed into abuse, disrespect, and even slavery and bondage. Eventually, these genies rebelled, but in doing so, they came under the sway of a nihilistic demigod known as Ahriman. Their new master twisted their form and granted them the power to avenge themselves upon their mortal overlords, leading to the birth of the first divs.

Since that first wave of corruption, new divs arise from the spirits of the most wicked and hateful genies who die on the Material Plane, or those truly betrayed by mortals and overcome through their desire for vengeance. Upon such a death, instead of returning to the Elemental Planes, these genies' spirits are trapped in the dread orbit of Abaddon, where Ahriman reshapes them as divs and hoists them back to the world to wreak vengeance upon mortals.
Pairaka.allSaves: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Hatred of Red.name: Hatred of Red
Hatred of Red.description:
Pairakas hate the color red. They won't wear the color or willingly enter any place painted red. Given a choice, they'll attack a creature wearing red first.

If barred from expressing their displeasure toward the color by force or some magical effect, they take @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage at the end of their turn.

Bubonic Plague.name: Bubonic Plague
Bubonic Plague.description:
A creature can't remove the fatigued condition while infected

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:23]

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and fatigued (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}, fatigued, and take @Damage[1d6[bleed]] every [[/gmr 1d20 #Persistent Damage Interval]]{1d20 minutes} (1 day)

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The pairaka can take the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid or animal. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with the Strikes, but it might change the damage type their strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Tormenting Dreams.name: Tormenting Dreams
Tormenting Dreams.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The pairaka torments a sleeping creature within 100 feet with visions of betrayals by loved ones and friends. The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:25] save, with the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} spell.

Bikkhasura.name: Bikkhasura
Bikkhasura.publicNotes: Asura who have been forcibly reincarnated across countless lifetimes, bikkhasuras have grown to nearly godlike levels of power.

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

Inescapable Aura.name: Inescapable Aura
Inescapable Aura.description: 30 feet. Creatures cannot teleport into or out of the bikkhasura's aura. Creatures attempting to teleport into the aura instead teleport to the nearest edge of the aura. Any attempts to teleport out of the aura are automatically disrupted.

Reactive Strike.name: Reactive Strike
Reactive Strike.description:
The bikkhasura gains 5 additional reactions at the beginning of each of their turns that they can use only for a Reactive Strike.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ReactiveStrike]

Bladestorm.name: Bladestorm
Bladestorm.description:
Requirements The bikkhasura is holding six spirit blades

Effect The bikkhasura makes up to six spirit blade Strikes, each against a diferent target. These attacks count toward the bikkhasura's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

Curse of Wisdom.name: Curse of Wisdom
Curse of Wisdom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[will|dc:42]

Stage 1 @Damage[12d6[mental]] damage and target cannot use reactions (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[14d6[mental]] damage and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[15d6[mental]] damage and target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

Direct Spirit Blades.name: Direct Spirit Blades
Direct Spirit Blades.description:
Requirements The bikkhasura has their spirit blades

Effect The bikkhasura directs one of its spirit blades to attack a target up to a distance of 50 feet away. Once a bikkhasura directs a spirit blade to attack a foe, the blade continues to make a single attack against that foe each round on the bikkhasura's turn until directed otherwise by the bikkhasura and as long as the foe remains within 50 feet of the bikkhasura. These weapons attack using the same statistics as the bikkhasura's spirit blade Strike and use the bikkhasura's multiple attack penalty. Any blades that are not within 50 feet of the bikkhasura at the end of its turn vanish.

Glorious Visage.name: Glorious Visage
Glorious Visage.description: The asura sanctifies themselves as either holy or unholy, gaining the trait corresponding to their choice and losing the opposing trait; their strikes, spells, and abilities also gain the trait corresponding to their choice. The asura also gains weakness 15 to the opposing sanctification and loses any weakness to its chosen sanctification. The choice is permanent until the asura uses this ability to change their sanctification.

Horrific Glimpse.name: Horrific Glimpse
Horrific Glimpse.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger The bikkhasura uses Glorious Visage

Effect The bikkhasura explodes with spiritual energy, dealing @Damage[9d6[spirit]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures within 30 feet. This ability has the holy trait if the bikkhasura has the holy trait and the unholy trait when the bikkhasura has the unholy trait.

Spirit Blades.name: Spirit Blades
Spirit Blades.description:
Frequency once per hour

Effect The bikkhasura summons six blades made out of spiritual energy. The blades either appear in the bikkhasura's hands or foat next to the bikkhasura until the asura directs one or spends an Interact action to grab it. The spirit blades can be dispelled with a successful counteract check (counteract rank 10, counteract DC 42). A successful counteract dispels all blades, even if some have been directed away from the bikkhasura.

Carnivorous Blob.name: 噬肉体 Carnivorous Blob
Carnivorous Blob.publicNotes: 嗜肉体是来自位于星辰彼方的破碎世界的贪婪产物，以休眠形态在星系中诞生，直至如同陨石一般坠入毫无防备的世界。这些庞然巨物可以在荒芜的洞窟或是贫瘠的废土中蛰伏数年。当嗜肉体察觉到有活物在附近时，它猛地转变成胶质生命体，寻找并且消化掉它能捕获到的每一个生物，直至其被毁灭，或是在无法寻得食物的24小时后返回蛰伏状态。通常，用以对抗嗜肉体的最安全的方法就是别让食物靠近它。这个团块能够分裂出小号的泥怪在战斗后隐藏起来，这意味着想要根除这些无心智的猎食者将是一件无比艰难的任务。

Motion Sense.name: 运动感知 Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: 噬肉体能通过震动以及空气或水的流动来感知附近的生物。

Retaliating Strike.name: 报复打击 Retaliating Strike
Retaliating Strike.description:
触发 噬肉体受到任意来源的伤害

效果 噬肉体对一个相邻目标进行一次伪足打击。如果相邻目标造成了触发伤害，则该生物为此次报复打击的目标。

Split.name: 分裂 Split
Split.description: 当具有不低于10点生命值的噬肉体受到穿刺或挥砍伤害时，它会分裂成两只相同的泥怪，每只具有原本一半的生命值。一只泥怪保持在原本相同空间，另一只则处于一个相邻的为被占据的空间。如果没有相邻空间未被占据，它自动推离生物和物体来让自己填满空间（GM来决定物体和生物是否过大或过重而无法推离）。

Carnivorous Blob Acid.name: 噬肉体酸 Carnivorous Blob Acid
Carnivorous Blob Acid.description: 噬肉体的酸蚀伤害只能影响肉体——不能影响骨头，石头，木头或其他材料——但其破坏力依然惊人。生物受到此酸蚀伤害时，它必须成功通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:33]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（大失败时为流失2）。每次后续失败，流失状态值都会增加1（大失败时增加2），最高到流失4。

Hesperid Queen.name: Hesperid Queen
Hesperid Queen.publicNotes:
Hesperid queens rule over isolated regions soaked in the light of sunset. They guard countless treasures and secrets, though for those who approach them with respect and offer an intriguing bargain, they're willing to part with knowledge or items beyond those secrets or valuables they've sworn to keep to themselves.

Hesperid queens are relatively likely to have powerful objects under their protection, such as ancient relics or artifacts. As such, they're keenly aware of the danger posed by unscrupulous treasure hunters seeking to obtain these items at any cost, and they use their incredible minds to set up devious countermeasures to protect their wards, even in the event of their own deaths.

Nymphs are fey guardians of nature possessed of great beauty and forms that meld breathtaking humanoid features with the natural elements they guard. Nymph queens are powerful nymphs who rule over and protect a much greater territory of untouched wilderness. For instance, a lampad might guard a beautiful underground cavern, but a lampad queen might call an entire system of caves their domain.

Tied to the Land.name: Tied to the Land
Tied to the Land.description:
A hesperid queen is intrinsically tied to a isolated region, usually an island or island chain, a remote coast, or secluded valley. As long as the queen is healthy, the environment is exceptionally resilient, allowing the hesperid queen to automatically attempt to counteract spells and rituals such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7yWXx3qC4eFNHhxD]{Blight} that would harm the environment, with a [[/r 1d20+37 #Counteract]]{+37} counteract modifier and a counteract rank of 10.

When the hesperid queen becomes physically or psychologically unhealthy, however, her warded region eventually becomes twisted or unhealthy as well. In that case, restoring the hesperid queen swiftly heals the entire region.

Nymph's Beauty.name: Nymph's Beauty
Nymph's Beauty.description: 30 feet. Creatures that start their turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:38] save or become transfixed in awe, causing them to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Hesperid queens can transform between their original form, which looks much like a typical nymph of their kind, and any Small or Medium humanoid form, typically choosing a version of their natural form that more closely resembles a humanoid.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Create Golden Apple.name: Create Golden Apple
Create Golden Apple.description:
While the hesperid queen is within their bonded location, they can spin golden light around an object they're holding of up to 20 cubic feet in volume and up to 80 Bulk. Doing so condenses the object into a magic apple made of golden light with light Bulk.

The golden apple reverts back to its original shape after a full day away from the hesperid's bonded location, or when the hesperid queen spends a single action (which has the concentrate trait) to end the effect.

Focus Beauty.name: Focus Beauty
Focus Beauty.description: The hesperid queen focuses her beauty upon a target within her aura. The creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:38] save. On a failure, it is affected as if by the hesperid queen's nymph's beauty aura; if it was already affected by the aura, it becomes overwhelmed with visions of bliss and beauty. The creature departs from the hesperid queen's domain as quickly and efficiently as it can for 1 hour, after which time it forgets ever reaching the hesperid queen's domain, how it did so, and everything that happened while it was within the domain.

Inspiration.name: Inspiration
Inspiration.description:
A hesperid queen can inspire a single intelligent creature by giving that creature a token of her favor, typically a lock of her hair. As long as the creature carries her token and remains in good standing with the lampad queen, the creature gains a +1 status bonus to all Crafting checks, Performance checks, and Will saves.

If a hesperid queen grants her Inspiration to a bard and they are that bard's muse, the bard gains an additional benefit depending on their muse theme: for lore muse, the bard also gains a +1 status bonus to all Lore checks; for maestro muse, the status bonus to Performance checks increases to +2 for the purpose of determining the effects of compositions; for polymath muse, the bard gains a +4 status bonus to untrained skill checks; and for all other muses, the Will save bonus increases to +2 against fey.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.iSyyR4QVOaY6mxtg]{Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration}

Cinder Dragon (Ancient).name: 古灰烬龙 Cinder Dragon (Ancient)
Cinder Dragon (Ancient).publicNotes: 在所有龙类之中，灰烬龙体型最为庞大，亦是最为凶猛的种类之一。它们通常性情暴躁易怒，要求他者给予敬畏——乃至臣服。灰烬龙的外貌正如其体内的烈焰，鳞片上常呈现红、橙、黄交错的火焰纹理。许多灰烬龙居住在活火山或其他同样炽热的地域之中。它们偏爱那些能承受高温的宝藏，因此宝石、黄金与白银常见于其囤积的财宝中。

Smoke Vision.name: 烟雾视觉 Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: 烟雾不会妨碍灰烬龙的视觉；它能无视由烟雾造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]状态。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal.name: 对抗原能的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal

Boiling Blood.name: 沸血 Boiling Blood
Boiling Blood.description:
触发 灰烬龙被一次近战攻击重击

效果 灰烬龙的高热之血飞溅至攻击者。该目标受到@Damage[10d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:41|basic]豁免）。

Reactive Strike (Jaws only).name: 反应打击（仅颚咬） Reactive Strike (Jaws only)

All Becomes Flame.name: 万象化焰 All Becomes Flame
All Becomes Flame.description:
灰烬龙诅咒60尺内的一个生物，使其魔法被原初火焰替代。目标必须进行@Check[will|dc:39]豁免。无论结果如何，目标会暂时免疫此能力1天。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标被诅咒1轮。诅咒期间，目标所造成的任何伤害，无论原始伤害类型为何，都会变为火焰伤害。被诅咒的目标可以使用一个动作临时压制诅咒1轮。

失败 如成功，但诅咒持续时间为1小时。

大失败 如成功，但诅咒持续时间为1天。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 灰烬龙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击与一次尾扫打击。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 灰烬龙的打击重击时，恢复烈焰吐息的使用次数。

Pyre Breath.name: 烈焰吐息 Pyre Breath
Pyre Breath.description: 灰烬龙喷吐出一股灼热烈焰，在@Template[type:cone|distance:60]范围内造成@Damage[18d6[fire]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:41|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。豁免大失败的生物会着火，受到@Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]]伤害。随后该区域被黑烟笼罩1分钟，效果与薄雾相同，但仅覆盖该锥形区域。灰烬龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Pyre Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用烈焰吐息。

Stoke the Flames.name: 煽燃烈焰 Stoke the Flames
Stoke the Flames.description: 灰烬龙激化周围的火势。所有在60尺范围内并正承受持续火焰伤害的敌人，额外受到@Damage[5d6[fire]]伤害。

Giant Fly.name: Giant Fly
Giant Fly.publicNotes:
This massive fly's twitching limbs seem to never stop moving as it constantly cleans itself and scoops anything edible into its mouthparts. While primarily carrion eaters, giant flies sometimes prey on livestock or other animals too slow to get away. They are not particularly dangerous, and are mostly reviled due to their obnoxious droning and habit of spreading disease.

Giant flies are pony-sized insects that have massive compound eyes and bodies bristling with short, stiff hairs. Their lairs are notorious for the rotting meat they stockpile to lay their eggs in. Their maggot dens are also prime breeding grounds for virulent diseases.

Avoid the Swat.name: Avoid the Swat
Avoid the Swat.description:
Trigger The giant fly is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see

Effect The giant fly gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the giant insect can Fly up to its fly Speed.

Fly Pox.name: Fly Pox
Fly Pox.description:
A giant fly could carry any disease, but most transmit a virulent but not fatal infection called fly pox with their bite

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:16]

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 as stage 1 (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

Stage 4 as stage 3 (1 day)

Stage 5 enfeebled 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 day)

Lacridaemon.name: Lacridaemon
Lacridaemon.publicNotes:
Souls who die from neglect or exposure due to becoming lost, trapped in small spaces, or otherwise being far from help can transform into lacridaemons. These weaker daemons are full of despair and typically lash out against anyone they see, believing them to have intentionally abandoned the lacridaemon to their fate. Many lacridaemons are born from the souls of wicked mortals who push others away and thus suffer lonely deaths. Exiled, corrupt nobles and violent criminals left to rot in solitary prisons are common among their ranks.

Lacridaemons tend to resemble humanoids with smooth, gray skin, a strange tail, and vicious claws. They each have patches of frost across their flesh, representing their ultimately cold and lonely ends. These patches appear on every lacridaemon even if their deaths weren't due to exposure to cold, as is the case for souls who perished alone from thirst in the desert.

Even in their fiendish state, lacridaemons can't help but consider themselves alone. It's not uncommon to find groups of lacridaemons where each daemon acts independently, as if the others weren't there. They tend to sit alone in dark corners reminiscent of the places of they died, sobbing loudly, but once they become aware of the presence of non-fiends, they are quick to attack, believing these creatures to be the same ones who abandoned them in life. A lacridaemon's supernatural abilities allow the fiend to subject others to a fate similar to the their own death, making it difficult to escape danger and find help.

Steal Bearings.name: Steal Bearings
Steal Bearings.description:
Trigger A creature within 30 feet Strides

Effect The lacridaemon attempts to redirect the triggering creature so it eventually becomes as lost as the lacridaemon. The triggering creature attempts a @Check[will|dc:17] save. Regardless of the result, the creature becomes temporarily immune to all attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} Bearings for 1 minute.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature treats all squares as difficult terrain for its Stride.

Critical Failure As failure, except that the lacridaemon determines where the target moves during the Stride, though it can't move it into hazardous terrain or a place it can't stand.

Weeping Aura.name: Weeping Aura
Weeping Aura.description: 60 feet. The sounds of crying constantly surround a lacridaemon. A creature that first enters the area must attempt a @Check[will|dc:17] save as the sounds cause major disorientation. On a failure, the creature takes a –2 status penalty to Survival checks to Sense Direction (–4 on a critical failure) for 1 day. After attempting the save, the creature is temporarily immune to the lacridaemon's weeping aura for 1 day. The penalties from multiple weeping auras can increase up to a cumulative total of –10.

Lacridaemon Venom.name: Lacridaemon Venom
Lacridaemon Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:20]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d4[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[1d8[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, and stupefied 1 (1 round)

Venomous Spray.name: Venomous Spray
Venomous Spray.description: The lacridaemon's begins to weep, spraying its venom-filled tears at all creatures within 30 feet. The creatures are immediately exposed to lacridaemon venom. Other lacridaemons are immune to this venom.

Badger.name: Badger
Badger.publicNotes: The typical badger has dark, brownish-gray fur highlighted with white markings, particularly on the head, giving it a striped mask of fur around its eyes. A threatened badger can swiftly become a ferocious combatant that typically fights until slain.

Ferocity.name: 凶猛 Ferocity
Ferocity.description:
Trigger The monster is reduced to 0 HP.

Effect The monster avoids being knocked out and remains at 1 HP, but its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} value increases by 1. When it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 3}, it can no longer use this ability

Stalker Automaton.name: Stalker Automaton
Stalker Automaton.publicNotes: Stalker automatons house the minds of skilled hunters, scouts, and assassins in bodies patterned after the great hunters of the natural world. Stalkers generally have the shape of wolves, large cats, and other predatory creatures. The ancient artifcers improved upon their natural abilities, adding in specialized systems of arcane camoufage and movement. Surviving stalkers still pride themselves as hunters without peer, even as they've adapted to their animalistic forms.

Astral Blink.name: Astral Blink
Astral Blink.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The stalker steps sideways into the astral realm, reappearing nearby. The stalker teleports to an unoccupied space within 15 feet that they can see.

Astral Pounce.name: Astral Pounce
Astral Pounce.description:
Requirements The stalker hasn't used Astral Blink this round

Effect The stalker Astral Blinks or Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the stalker began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike. The stalker then Astral Blinks or Strides again, whichever it did not already do.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The creature's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Shade (Maelstrom).name: 残影（大漩涡） Shade (Maelstrom)
Shade (Maelstrom).publicNotes:
无形者的外观看起来像是半融化的生前版本的残留物

当凡人死亡时，他们的灵魂将前往外环位面中的骨园（Boneyard），在那里接受死亡女神法莱斯玛的审判。一旦他们受到审判，他们的灵魂就会前往来世接受最终奖赏或惩罚，在这个过程中，他们会变成一种叫做"残影"的生物。这个过程会赋予这些灵魂一个新的身体，其身体的外形由它前往的位面的主要意识形态所塑造。残影的生前记忆几乎被抹去，只留下一些如同梦境般模糊的记忆碎片。无论残影生前的体型、力量或天性如何，他们在来世都是中型生物。

阴魂的存在可能会持续无数纪元，但这种状态并非一成不变的。神祇、浩瀚众界（Great Beyond）的居民、甚至位面本身都可能进一步转变残影的本质，通过将其转变为原始的精粹（quintessence），心魂要素（spiritual essence）被用于扩张位面的物理表征，或被转变为天族、魔族、观察者之类的新形态。如果残影死亡，他们的身体会在类似腐烂的过程中分解，他们的本质会回归至组成位面本身的精粹或元素中。这代表着灵魂之旅的真正终结——它们的生命精华与浩瀚众界的核心融为一体，被回收到创生熔炉中，为新灵魂的诞生提供能量。

Planar Incarnation - Maelstrom (The Shap.name: 大漩涡位面塑形（无形者） Planar Incarnation - Maelstrom (The Shapeless)
Planar Incarnation - Maelstrom (The Shap.description:
所有残影都会被所在的位面塑造形体，并表现出位面的本质。他们的数据有如下调整。他们也可能获得和位面相关的生物特征。

大漩涡 Maelstrom（"无形者" the Shapeless） 无形者的外观看起来像是半融化的生前版本的残留物

  • 语言 幻蛇语
  • 额外能力 免疫重击和精准伤害
  • 近战 拳击+7，伤害 1d8+2钝击

Skeleton Infantry.name: 骷髅步兵团 Skeleton Infantry
Skeleton Infantry.publicNotes:
这只骷髅部队曾经是一队来自古代帝国的纪律严明的盾矛步兵。

在亡者的行列中，没有哪种不死有着如骷髅一般无穷的数量与种类。虽然大多数骷髅几乎完全由骨头构成，但少部分还保留着一些肉屑来帮助它们运动，比如翼膜。

Form a Phalanx.name: 结成方阵 Form a Phalanx
Form a Phalanx.description: 骷髅们举起盾牌来保护战友。直至下回合开始前，步兵团的AC获得+2环境加值。

Hurl Javelins!.name: 投掷标枪！ Hurl Javelins!
Hurl Javelins!.description: 部队成员投出一排标枪，在部队30尺内一点@Template[type:burst|distance:10]范围内的所有生物受到@Damage[(2d6+10)[piercing]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:27|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。当部队减少到2部分或更少时，伤害区域减少为@Template[type:burst|distance:5]。

Lower Spears!.name: 架起长矛！ Lower Spears!
Lower Spears!.description:
1至3

频率 每轮一次

效果 骷髅对@Template[emanation|distance:10]范围内的所有敌人进行协调一致的长矛攻击（@Check[reflex|dc:27|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。伤害基于使用动作的数量

1 @Damage[2d8[piercing]|options:area-damage]

2 @Damage[(3d8+7)[piercing]|options:area-damage]

3 @Damage[(4d8+7)[piercing]|options:area-damage]

Phalanx Charge.name: 方阵冲锋 Phalanx Charge
Phalanx Charge.description:
需求 步兵团正结成方阵

效果 骷髅们放低长矛开始冲锋，部队直线行走直到它们邻接一个敌人，然后它们使用架起长矛！造成@Damage[(3d8+7)[piercing]]伤害。任何豁免失败的生物同时被击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

Deep One Elder.name: 深潜者长老 Deep One Elder
Deep One Elder.publicNotes:
只要有足够多的时间，深潜者长老便能长到令人目眩的身高。

这种笨重，两栖，不灭的类人生物被称作深潜者，栖息于格拉利昂的沿海地带与深海海沟。尽管多数只求独善其身，仍有部分成员不遗余力地扩张族群规模。

Pressurized.name: 稳压 Pressurized
Pressurized.description: 深潜者长老免疫因水压变化而造成的伤害和其他负面效果。

Endless.name: 无终 Endless
Endless.description: 深潜者不会衰老，且免疫造成魔法衰老的法术和其他效果。除非被杀死，深潜者永生不死。

Frightful Presence.name: 恐怖威压 Frightful Presence
Frightful Presence.description:
60尺，@Check[will|dc:31]。

豁免失败的生物还将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（大失败时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}）。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FrightfulPresence]

Mental Mirror.name: 心灵之镜 Mental Mirror
Mental Mirror.description: 对深潜者长老的心灵效果失败时会被反射至来源，如同法术回击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9igi8LcrNQKwljK7]。

Devastation.name: 浩劫 Devastation
Devastation.description: 深潜者长老的爪打击忽视物体前10点硬度。此外，重击时，目标必须成功通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:34]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

Trample.name: 践踏 Trample
Trample.description:
超大型或更小体型，足，@Check[reflex|dc:31|basic]

深潜者可以游泳至多其两倍游泳速度的距离，取代行走。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]

Watery Void.name: 水域虚空 Watery Void
Watery Void.description:
深潜者长老在60尺内的@Template[type:burst|distance:20]范围内制造出一片无尽的水域虚空，将生物卷入漩涡中。如果在水下施展，水域虚空将形成一个高60尺，半径20尺的圆柱体。虚空显现时处于区域内或在区域内结束回合的生物，受到@Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]伤害与@Damage[3d8[void]|options:area-damage]伤害，且必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:31]豁免。虚空持续至深潜者长老的下个回合结束。深潜者长老可以维持虚空以延长持续时间1轮，至多到总计4轮，且可以移动虚空至多15尺。效果结束时，长老在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Watery Void]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用水域虚空。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物受到一半伤害，且处于虚空中时在速度上承受-5尺环境减值

失败 生物受到全额伤害，且处于虚空中时在速度上承受-10尺环境减值

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害，被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]，且处于虚空中时在速度上承受-10尺环境减值

Giant Maggot.name: Giant Maggot
Giant Maggot.publicNotes:
Giant flies lay their eggs on the bodies of larger monsters or livestock. When they hatch, these eggs release squirming maggots the size of humans, ravenous young who voraciously consume any flesh in the immediate vicinity—typically starting with the body upon which they were born.

Giant flies are pony-sized insects that have massive compound eyes and bodies bristling with short, stiff hairs. Their lairs are notorious for the rotting meat they stockpile to lay their eggs in. Their maggot dens are also prime breeding grounds for virulent diseases.

Regurgitation.name: Regurgitation
Regurgitation.description:
Trigger The giant maggot takes damage

Effect The giant maggot regurgitates its rancid, foul meal. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:16] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). The giant maggot can't use Regurgitation again until it spends at least an hour feeding on a corpse.

Gnaw Flesh.name: Gnaw Flesh
Gnaw Flesh.description:
Requirements The giant maggot has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} a creature

Effect The giant maggot deals @Damage[(1d8+2)[slashing]] damage to the grabbed creature as it chews the creature's flesh (@Check[reflex|dc:16|basic] save).

Coral Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).name: 古珊瑚龙施法者 Coral Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster)
Coral Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).publicNotes: 珊瑚龙是守护广袤海洋珊瑚礁的原始守护者，珊瑚礁遍布于格拉利昂的各大海洋中。即便在龙族中，珊瑚龙也因其傲慢与虚荣而尤为突出，它们为自己覆满珊瑚的鳞片和所保护的五彩斑斓的珊瑚礁而骄傲。珊瑚龙喜欢装饰它们的珊瑚礁，它们视这些珊瑚礁为巢穴，常常用美丽的物品装饰，偶尔也会加入一些贵重物品，如金币。那些寻求珊瑚龙宠爱的人常会发现，这些龙容易被奉承所打动，尤其是当奉承与闪亮或色彩鲜艳的礼物相结合时，这些礼物能与龙及其水下领域的璀璨美丽相得益彰。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal.name: 对抗原能的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal

Biomineralize.name: 生物矿化 Biomineralize
Biomineralize.description:
触发 珊瑚龙被一个没有长触及特征的近战武器或无武装攻击重击，且该攻击造成挥砍或穿刺伤害

效果 珊瑚龙的伤口喷出一股血液，瞬间钙化为一根尖锐的珊瑚枝。珊瑚枝刺穿触发的生物，造成@Damage[8d6[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic]豁免）。豁免大失败的生物还会额外受到@Damage[1d4[persistent,bleed]]伤害。无论结果如何，珊瑚都会随后崩溃为尘土。

Kaleidoscopic Display.name: 万花华彩 Kaleidoscopic Display
Kaleidoscopic Display.description:
90尺。覆盖龙体的珊瑚构造闪烁着鲜艳的色彩，令感官超负荷，迫使任何进入或在灵光内开始回合的生物必须进行一次@Check[fortitude|dc:36]豁免。无论结果如何，该生物暂时免疫该珊瑚龙的万花华彩1分钟。

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]1轮

失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]1轮

大失败 该生物目盲1轮并目眩1分钟。

Reef Bond.name: 礁石契约 Reef Bond
Reef Bond.description:
每条珊瑚龙都与一个活珊瑚礁有神秘联系。如果珊瑚龙距离它们的珊瑚礁超过3英里，它们会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}且无法恢复，每6小时恶心值增加1，除非它们成功进行一次@Check[fortitude|dc:40]豁免。24小时后，珊瑚龙获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}；每24小时流失值增加1。

如果珊瑚礁遭受重大伤害，珊瑚龙会立即察觉到珊瑚礁受损的地点，但无法知道伤害的来源或性质。如果珊瑚礁被完全摧毁，珊瑚龙会立即死亡。

Hydraulic Breath.name: 液压吐息 Hydraulic Breath
Hydraulic Breath.description: 珊瑚龙喷出一股高压水流，在@Template[type:line|distance:120]范围内造成@Damage[18d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic|options:area-effect,forced-movement,inflicts:prone]豁免）。豁免大失败的生物被推离10尺并被击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。珊瑚龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Hydraulic Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用液压吐息。

Reef Armor.name: 珊瑚护甲 Reef Armor
Reef Armor.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 珊瑚龙将自己包裹在一道保护性珊瑚壳中，获得50临时生命值，并在临时生命值被耗尽前对穿刺伤害和挥砍伤害具有10点抗力。效果持续1分钟，直到被摧毁，或龙解消效果。

Reef Meld.name: 珊瑚融合 Reef Meld
Reef Meld.description:
频率 每日一次

需求 珊瑚龙与它们的绑定珊瑚礁有物理接触

效果 珊瑚龙与珊瑚礁融合并消失，同时最多可带着八名自愿的生物进入一个异次元空间，在这个空间中既无法影响外界，也不会被外界影响。该效果无限期持续直到珊瑚龙解消为止。一旦融合，珊瑚龙可以花费1分钟移动并从其珊瑚礁上任意10英里内的点出现。

Wyrwood Sneak.name: 汲魂木潜行者 Wyrwood Sneak
Wyrwood Sneak.publicNotes:
汲魂木潜行者擅长神不知鬼不觉地深入敌后，进行侦查行动并悄无声息地消灭威胁。

最初，汲魂木是作为有灵智的魔法仆从而被创造出来的，他们从那些压迫着他们的创造者手中夺得了知道更多同类的办法，而如今，他们正激烈地捍卫着自己的自由与自主。这些小巧灵活的活体机械依靠智慧与速度来躲避他们的敌人并收集到更多有利的信息。大多数汲魂木都极为严谨且精明，以至于很多外人都意味他们没有感情可言。不过实际上，汲魂木的内心充斥着强烈的好奇心，对他们所感兴趣的事物充满着热情。无论个人利益如何，汲魂木始终会将族群的生存摆在首位，必要时，他们甚至会牺牲其它汲魂木的利益以换取族群的延续。

尽管汲魂木为自己争取到了自由，但他们位于阿维斯坦（Avistan）的家园仍在建设之中。一些阿维斯塔人仍将汲魂木视作某种秘密组织的特别工具，而还有一些人则认为这些汲魂木都是些背叛了创造者的叛徒。由于担心自身安危，许多汲魂木逃离了内海地区，并在阿卡迪亚（Arcadia）建立起了新的家园。在沿海城市色嘉达（Segada），汲魂木拥有着一个相对和平且安全的生活环境，不过他们还是更喜欢那种与世隔绝的生活方式。

由于汲魂木都格外地自力更生，因此他们拥有着远超其他文化的适应能力。在汲魂木的社区中，当有一项特定的技能或岗位被人们所需要时，该社区中的一位成员——无论他是志愿如此还是被社区所选中——将会主动学习这一被大家需要的能力。汲魂木们并不觉得任务与任务之间有尊卑之别、上下之分，这种狂妄自大的判断模式与汲魂木的构装体天性身来八字不合。

汲魂木的灵魂与作为其心脏的魔法石紧密相连，有时，哪怕他们的构装躯体被摧毁殆尽，他们的精魂也能借着魔法心石存活下来。此时，另一个汲魂木有可能会接过其亲密同伴的幸存心石，并将其融入到自己的躯体之中。于是乎，在这种情况下，一个躯体内便可能寄居着数个汲魂木的灵魂。

Living Machine.name: 活体机械 Living Machine
Living Machine.description: 尽管他们的躯体是由有机的构装物所组成，但汲魂木本质上还是一种活物。所以当汲魂木的HP下降至0点时，他们不会立即被摧毁，而是会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]直至最终死亡。他们无需进食或饮水。他们可以被那些以生物或构装体为目标的效果所影响。

No Breath.name: 无须呼吸 No Breath
No Breath.description: 汲魂木无需呼吸，因而免疫任何需要呼吸的效果，比如吸入式的毒素。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 汲魂木对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物额外造成1d6精准伤害。

Resurrection Dragon (Young).name: 青年复生龙 Resurrection Dragon (Young)
Resurrection Dragon (Young).publicNotes: 复生龙徘徊于生与死之间。它们精通命能，使得它们能够将死者复生，同时也精通虚能，能够赋予他人死亡。它们利用这些能力戏弄凡人的生命，召唤灵魂来帮助自己，或复生它们认为重要或有趣的生物。复生龙的巢穴通常是一个荒凉之地。虽然它们像其他龙一样囤积财富，但它们几乎不装饰自己的巢穴，财宝通常被存放在黑暗的角落里，仿佛它们对自己的财物毫不在乎。然而，复生龙倾向于保留从复生的生物或计划复生的生物那里得到的纪念物，而这些物品会特别安全地保管。

Reawaken!.name: 醒来！ Reawaken!
Reawaken!.description:
触发 复生龙能看到的一个活物死亡

效果 复生龙利用神术与生命能量将灵魂重新连接到已死躯壳。该自愿生物将在其下回合开始时复活，同时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying 1}状态。每个生物只能被此能力复生一次。

Risen Commander.name: 复生指挥官 Risen Commander
Risen Commander.description: 复生龙与它的仆从有着强烈的联系，复生龙每回合可以用一个自由动作维持@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hghGRzOSzEl4UXdS]。

Siphon Life.name: 生命吸取 Siphon Life
Siphon Life.description:
触发 一个60尺内的生物使用了一个恢复生命值的治疗效果

效果 复生龙将命能从该效果中引导开，从而将其影响降到最低。触发恢复生命值效果的所有掷骰取最小值，并且任何恢复生命值的固定值（如两动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]的附加生命值）都会被减半。然后，复生龙获得1d8临时生命值，持续1轮。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 复生龙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击与一次尾扫打击。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 复生龙的打击重击时会恢复其汲魂吐息的充能。

Soul Siphoning Breath.name: 汲魂吐息 Soul Siphoning Breath
Soul Siphoning Breath.description: 复生龙释放一股神圣能量，在@Template[type:cone|distance:30]范围内造成@Damage[7d6[void]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:26|basic|options:area-effect]豁免），并从范围内的生物身上汲取生命之力。复生龙获得快速治疗5，直到其汲魂吐息重新充能。复生龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Soul Siphoning Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用汲魂吐息。

Urglid.name: Urglid
Urglid.publicNotes: The hulking monstrosities known as urglids form from the souls of murderous undertakers, sadists who buried their victims alive, and intentionally neglectful grave keepers who gave up their watch over the dead. They seek to perpetuate their mortal sins as demons and use their fiendish powers to subject mortals to the terrors of vivisepulture. Other urglids find grave sites repulsive and will often destroy headstones and other grave markers. Without such markers, these graves are often lost and forgotten, a detail that pleases an urglid. Standing over 12 feet tall and weighing over 3,000 pounds, the demon has a head that seems sunken into their torso, and a gaping, toothy mouth that opens at the top of their chest.
Urglid.allSaves: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值

Consecration Vulnerability.name: Consecration Vulnerability
Consecration Vulnerability.description:
Dedicated to the desecration of graves, an urglid takes @Damage[(3d6+6)[mental]] damage each round they're within the area of an effect with the consecration trait. In addition, the demon's weakness to holy increases to 30 for 1 round the first time they take damage from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water} each turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.92D7H9SiMSK3rNlM]{Effect: Consecration Vulnerability}

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Earth Glide.name: Earth Glide
Earth Glide.description: The urglid can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through any earthen matter, including rock. When they do so, the urglid moves at their full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing unless they choose to do so.

Gravechoke.name: Gravechoke
Gravechoke.description: The urglid emits a putrid pulse that targets all living creatures within a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. Creatures in this area that fail a @Check[fortitude|dc:30] save become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Ravenous Earthunholy.name: Ravenous Earthunholy
Ravenous Earthunholy.description: With a single, devious thought, the urglid causes a mound of grave soil to well up at a creature's feet. That creature must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:30] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} ([[/act escape dc=30]]). The restrained creature then begins sinking below the ground into a spontaneously formed grave. A creature restrained by this ability for 3 rounds is buried 6 feet deep in the ground and begins suffocating within 1 minute. A buried creature must be dug up to be freed (see Burial on page 96 of GM Core). A creature that is slain by Ravenous Earth rises as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.LHHgGSs0ELCR4CYK]{Ghoul} the next midnight.

Sulfur Zombie.name: Sulfur Zombie
Sulfur Zombie.publicNotes:
Glowing with a dull amber light, these odious creatures spawn from a combination of baleful magic and fire. These destructive creations sow chaos and demolish fortifications, making them the bane of besieged cities.

Necromancers most often create these mindless undead as obedient, expendable servitors. Left to its own devices, a zombie seeks only to consume the living, stopping only when its rotting body can no longer hold together.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A sulfur zombie is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Death Throes.name: Death Throes
Death Throes.description: When a sulfur zombie dies, its body explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] of fire and debris that deals @Damage[2d10[bludgeoning],2d10[fire]|options:area-damage]{2d10 bludgeoning damage and 2d10 fire damage} to each creature in the area (@Check[reflex|dc:21|basic] save).

Blinding Sulfur.name: Blinding Sulfur
Blinding Sulfur.description: A sulfur zombie burns with putrid inner fire. A creature hit by a sulfur zombie's fist Strike must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:22] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round, or for 1 minute on a critical failure.

Tripkee Scout.name: Tripkee Scout
Tripkee Scout.publicNotes:
Tripkee scouts typically keep watch on the outskirts of tripkee settlements.

Tripkees make their homes in the treetops of jungles and forests. These frog-like humanoids are uniquely adapted to their environment, with oversized eyes that give them keen vision in both light and dark and large toes that allow them to easily scale trees. Tripkees vary widely in physical appearance, with their physiologies influenced by their surrounding environment. Typical tripkees stand just over 2 feet tall and weigh approximately 30 pounds.

Whatever region they come from, tripkees tend to be peaceful hunter-gatherers. They cultivate mushroom patches and gather a wide array of fruits from the surrounding wilderness.

A History of Neutrality

Tripkee villages rarely get involved in the conflicts of other communities despite various trade-based alliances, preferring to focus on maintaining relative peace within their own small societies. Legends explain this attitude with a tale of a tripkee champion who dragged his people into a war between humans and charau-ka. The stories differ as to which side the tripkees took, but every version ends with the bloody deaths of the hero and his family. Since that time, village elders claim, tripkees have done their best to remain far from the conflicts of others.

Hurl Net.name: Hurl Net
Hurl Net.description:
Requirements The tripkee is wielding a net in two hands

Effect The tripkee makes a ranged Strike (with a [[/r 1d20+9]]{+9} attack modifier) against a Medium or smaller creature within 20 feet. On a hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. On a critical hit, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} instead. The DC to [[/act escape dc=16]] the net is 16. A creature adjacent to the target can Interact with the net to remove it.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.q2D1QBalqBQfKzTc]{Effect: Hurl Net}

Jungle Passage.name: Jungle Passage
Jungle Passage.description: Tripkees ignore difficult terrain in forests and jungles.

Girtablilu Sentry.name: Girtablilu Sentry
Girtablilu Sentry.publicNotes:
Sentries patrol the outskirts of girtablilu communities, watching for external threats like desert drakes, stormcrown dragons, or adventuring parties set on recklessly exploring the girtablilus' sacred sites.

Girtablilus are desert-dwelling guardians with the upper bodies of muscular humanoids and the lower bodies of massive scorpions. They are most often found defending ancient temples and religious artifacts with zealous fervor. Some believe they were created by a long-dead god millennia ago to act as guardians, but girtablilus consider the subject of their origin taboo and refuse to address the theory.

Because girtablilus accept a wide range of religions and belief systems, some outsiders believe they also worship their own ancient pantheon. In truth, girtablilus exclusively revere and protect sites dedicated to deities considered lost to civilization. In this way, they act as preservers of holy practices that have otherwise been forgotten beneath the desert's shifting sands.

Though girtablilus are used to explorers seeking entrance to the sites they defend, they might welcome those who earnestly wish to learn or offer reverence. Some even proudly share their beliefs with others, eager for the opportunity to preach to someone new. They show no mercy, however, to those who attempt to desecrate the sites and objects of their worship, or to those who would violate the tenets of their faith.

Girtablilus are skilled fighters who keep trained giant scorpions as pets, and they remain unmatched when it comes to fighting in the desert. They require relatively little food or water, and they rely on their stamina to outlast their enemies. When necessary, they can stalk their quarry for days or even weeks, coordinating with their pets to drive their prey in circles. Once exhausted, few foes can stand up to a girtablilu's physical prowess—or to their deadly venom.

Desert Passage.name: Desert Passage
Desert Passage.description: A girtablilu ignores natural difficult terrain in the desert.

Girtablilu Venom.name: Girtablilu Venom
Girtablilu Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:24]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Resurrection Dragon (Adult, Spellcaster).name: 成年复生龙施法者 Resurrection Dragon (Adult, Spellcaster)
Resurrection Dragon (Adult, Spellcaster).publicNotes: 复生龙徘徊于生与死之间。它们精通命能，使得它们能够将死者复生，同时也精通虚能，能够赋予他人死亡。它们利用这些能力戏弄凡人的生命，召唤灵魂来帮助自己，或复生它们认为重要或有趣的生物。复生龙的巢穴通常是一个荒凉之地。虽然它们像其他龙一样囤积财富，但它们几乎不装饰自己的巢穴，财宝通常被存放在黑暗的角落里，仿佛它们对自己的财物毫不在乎。然而，复生龙倾向于保留从复生的生物或计划复生的生物那里得到的纪念物，而这些物品会特别安全地保管。

Reawaken!.name: 醒来！ Reawaken!
Reawaken!.description:
触发 复生龙能看到的一个活物死亡

效果 复生龙利用神术与生命能量将灵魂重新连接到已死躯壳。该自愿生物将在其下回合开始时复活，生命值稳定在0。每个生物只能被此能力复生一次。

Risen Commander.name: 复生指挥官 Risen Commander
Risen Commander.description: 复生龙与它的仆从有着强烈的联系，复生龙每回合可以用一个自由动作维持@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hghGRzOSzEl4UXdS]。

Siphon Life.name: 生命吸取 Siphon Life
Siphon Life.description:
触发 一个60尺内的生物使用了一个恢复生命值的治疗效果

效果 复生龙将命能从该效果中引导开，从而将其影响降到最低。触发恢复生命值效果的所有掷骰取最小值，并且任何恢复生命值的固定值（如两动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]的附加生命值）都会被减半。然后，复生龙获得2d8临时生命值，持续1轮。

Arise!.name: 重生！ Arise!
Arise!.description:
复生龙利用其对命能的精通将其灵魂投射到骨园，并将一个自愿生物的灵魂拉回到其躯体，整个过程需要1小时。这具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]的效果，但目标的最大等级为8级，且灵魂与复生龙的灵魂连接。一次只能有一个生物与复生龙的灵魂连接。如果目标与复生龙不在同一位面或复生龙死亡，则复生生物会死亡，且无法再用重生！能力复生。复生龙可以随时解消该连接。如此做并不会阻止复生龙再次对该生物使用重生！能力。

当以这种方式复生后，该生物仍然可以被死者复活、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]及类似效果选为目标。这会使其完全恢复生命，解除与复生龙的连接，并允许复生龙与另一个生物建立连接。

Soul Siphoning Breath.name: 汲魂吐息 Soul Siphoning Breath
Soul Siphoning Breath.description: 复生龙释放一股神圣能量，在@Template[type:cone|distance:40]范围内造成@Damage[11d6[void]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:32|basic|options:area-effect]豁免），并从范围内的生物身上汲取生命之力。复生龙获得快速治疗10，直到其汲魂吐息重新充能。复生龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Soul Siphoning Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用汲魂吐息。

Zombie Dragon.name: Zombie Dragon
Zombie Dragon.publicNotes:
The rotted husk of a once great dragon, this abomination has lost all its former splendor, but none of the ferocity. Its patchy, rotted wings don't generate enough lift to keep it aloft, but the foul necromantic energies animating it still allow it to fly, albeit slowly.

Necromancers most often create these mindless undead as obedient, expendable servitors. Left to its own devices, a zombie seeks only to consume the living, stopping only when its rotting body can no longer hold together.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: The zombie dragon is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Viscera Breath.name: Viscera Breath
Viscera Breath.description: The zombie dragon breathes a wave of fetid viscera that deals @Damage[5d6[bludgeoning],5d6[poison]|options:area-damage]{5d6 bludgeoning damage and 5d6 poison damage} (@Check[reflex|dc:28|basic|options:area-effect,inflicts:sickened] save).
