Maddening Cacophony.description: 60 feet. A shoggoth constantly voices syllables and mutterings that mortals were not meant to hear. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:38] save or become confused for 1 round ([[/gmr 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds} on a critical failure). A creature that successfully saves is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description:
@Damage[(2d10+15)[bludgeoning]], @Check[fortitude|dc:40|basic]

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. The DC present here is a moderate DC for the creature level according to the Gamemastery Guide creature building Tables.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Constrict]

Eat Away.name: Eat Away
Eat Away.description: A creature that begins its turn inside the shoggoth takes @Damage[9d6[acid]] damage.

Valkyrie.name: 女武神 Valkyrie
Valkyrie.publicNotes:
凡有钢铁相击之处，女武神的歌声便随之响起。作为战死者的挑选人和所谓的战场天使，女武神是体格魁梧的类人个体，她们追寻最壮阔的战役与传奇冲突，只为夺取世间最伟大战士的灵魂。女武神将这些灵魂转化为永恒不灭的战士，即众所周知的英灵。

女武神多侍奉战斗与战争的神明，但亦可效忠任何她们认为值得的神祇。战神古拉姆尤以拥有女武神与英灵神仆闻名。贝丝玛拉同样拥有女武神神仆，许多"幽灵船"传说实则记载着与效忠海盗女王的英灵船队相遇的经历。

Claimer of the Slain.name: 战死者挑选人 Claimer of the Slain
Claimer of the Slain.description: 女武神能侦测到刚刚在战斗中死去的灵魂。一位女武神可以花费10分钟在一个死去不超过12小时的生物的尸体前祈祷，如果该生物值得成为英灵，女武神将该生物转化为英灵。

Ravenspeaker.name: 鸦语者 Ravenspeaker
Ravenspeaker.description: 女武神将渡鸦用作仆从和间谍。她能与渡鸦交流，且可以拥有最多三只听从她命令的渡鸦仆从。女武神总是能通过仆从渡鸦的感官观察。

Reactive Strike.name: 反应打击 Reactive Strike
Reactive Strike.description:
触发 你触及范围内的一个生物使用操作或移动动作，进行远程攻击，或者使用移动动作时离开一个方格。

你攻击露出破绽的敌人。对触发此动作的目标进行一次近战打击。如果该攻击为重击，并且触发此动作的是一个操作动作，则打断此动作。这次打击不计入你的多重攻击减值，你的多重攻击减值也不应用于此次打击。

Recall the Fallen.name: 唤回陨落者 Recall the Fallen
Recall the Fallen.description:
频率 每日一次

触发 一个60尺内且并非构装体或不死生物的盟友被削减至0点生命值，且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]状态值不超过2

效果 女武神恢复目标@Damage[5d10[healing]]生命值。

Storm of Battle.name: 战斗风暴 Storm of Battle
Storm of Battle.description: 女武神将长枪猛地掷向空中，在@Template[burst|distance:100]范围内制造一场巨大雷暴。雷电长枪如雨点般落在区域内敌人身上，造成@Damage[4d12[electricity]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。

Grodair.name: Grodair
Grodair.publicNotes:
Grodairs are bizarre fishlike creature native to the First World. Their supernatural physiology includes a strange organ with an extradimensional space capable of storing thousands of gallons of water. This grants grodairs the ability to create a suitable environment for themselves anywhere by releasing the water, quickly transforming any surrounding land into a shallow bog. When grodairs wish to leave for a new location, they simply suck up all the water back up. When necessary, grodairs can also travel on land by walking upon the tangle of long, fleshy tentacles that dangle from their bellies.

Grodairs have two sets of eyes that function independently. While this makes the creatures difficult to surprise, it also makes them easy to distract. During conversations, they have a tendency to lose focus quickly and have difficulty remembering things. Still, they are avid conversationalists and enjoy hearing tales about the world. While this quality makes grodairs quite likable, they aren't reliable. They have difficulty following plans or schedules, and they can keep a secret only if they happen to forget it first. For these reasons, grodairs don't always make the best allies.

Grodairs are voracious and curious omnivores who love trying new foods-in fact, the pursuit of new and interesting food is the most common reason that they venture out of First World. They can also capture and store within their throats any small animals and plants easily suspended in water, and eject them for consumption at a later time.

Death Flood.name: Death Flood
Death Flood.description: When a grodair dies, its body explodes in a blast of pressurized water that deals @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage to creatures within a @Template[emanation|distance:15] (@Check[reflex|dc:22|basic|options:area-effect] save). A creature that fails its save is pushed 5 feet (or 10 feet on a critical failure).

Muddy Field.name: Muddy Field
Muddy Field.description: The grodair transforms all soil, sand, or similar sediment in a @Template[emanation|distance:10] into mud for 1 round. This mud is difficult terrain for creatures other than grodairs.

Organ of Endless Water.name: Organ of Endless Water
Organ of Endless Water.description: The grodair causes water to pour from a magical sac on its spine, either a stream of water at a rate of 1 gallon per round, or a fountain in a 5-foot-long stream at a rate of 5 gallons per round. It can stop the flow of water as a single action.

Slime Mold.name: 黏菌 Slime Mold
Slime Mold.publicNotes:
黏菌看起来是一堆覆盖着厚厚真菌层的泥土与碎屑，散发着淡淡的腐臭味。真菌与黏菌形成共生关系，既充当外部消化系统，又能获取所需养分。这团泥怪静止不动，直到活体猎物进入攻击范围，随即伸出恶心的伪足猛然扑击。一旦接触，黏菌便会将名为"黏腐病"的恶性传染病感染给猎物，这种恐怖的疾病会痛苦地腐蚀受害者的血肉。初期症状表现为剧痛性皮疹与关节剧痛。但随着孢子持续侵蚀，后期感染生物的血肉将开始液化，如溪流般流淌。死亡降临时，尸体会瞬间裂开，释放出全新的黏菌。

凭借其诡异的物理结构与分解吞噬各类物质的能力，泥怪几乎能适应任何气候，尤其在魔法或炼金术改造的加持下。正因如此，探险者们时常遭遇这些无定形生物中令人毛骨悚然的新变种。

Motion Sense.name: 运动感知 Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: 黏菌能通过震动以及空气或水的流动来感知附近的生物。

Slime Rot.name: 黏腐病 Slime Rot
Slime Rot.description:
豁免骰 @Check[fortitude|dc:18]

潜伏期 [[/gmr 1d4 #days]]{1d4日}

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（1日）

阶段2 同阶段1（1日）

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}（1日）

阶段4 同阶段3（1日）

阶段5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]（无法通过察觉检定醒来）（1日）

阶段6 死亡，尸体爆裂释放出一只新的黏菌。

Cinder Dragon (Adult).name: 成年灰烬龙 Cinder Dragon (Adult)
Cinder Dragon (Adult).publicNotes: 在所有龙类之中，灰烬龙体型最为庞大，亦是最为凶猛的种类之一。它们通常性情暴躁易怒，要求他者给予敬畏——乃至臣服。灰烬龙的外貌正如其体内的烈焰，鳞片上常呈现红、橙、黄交错的火焰纹理。许多灰烬龙居住在活火山或其他同样炽热的地域之中。它们偏爱那些能承受高温的宝藏，因此宝石、黄金与白银常见于其囤积的财宝中。

Smoke Vision.name: 烟雾视觉 Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: 烟雾不会妨碍灰烬龙的视觉；它能无视由烟雾造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]状态。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal.name: 对抗原能的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Primal

Boiling Blood.name: 沸血 Boiling Blood
Boiling Blood.description:
触发 灰烬龙被一次近战攻击重击

效果 灰烬龙的高热之血飞溅至攻击者。该目标受到@Damage[8d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:34|basic]豁免）。

Reactive Strike (Jaws only).name: 反应打击（仅颚咬） Reactive Strike (Jaws only)

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 灰烬龙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击与一次尾扫打击。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 灰烬龙的打击重击时，恢复烈焰吐息的使用次数。

Pyre Breath.name: 烈焰吐息 Pyre Breath
Pyre Breath.description: 灰烬龙喷吐出一股灼热烈焰，在@Template[type:cone|distance:50]范围内造成@Damage[13d6[fire]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:34|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。豁免大失败的生物会着火，受到@Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]]伤害。随后该区域被黑烟笼罩1分钟，效果与薄雾相同，但仅覆盖该锥形区域。灰烬龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Pyre Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用烈焰吐息。

Stoke the Flames.name: 煽燃烈焰 Stoke the Flames
Stoke the Flames.description: 灰烬龙激化周围的火势。所有在60尺范围内并正承受持续火焰伤害的敌人，额外受到@Damage[4d6[fire]]伤害。

Vaspercham.name: 蜗魄龛君 Vaspercham
Vaspercham.publicNotes: 蜗魄龛君是栖息水畔的水生恐怖生物，以暴力为乐，潜伏在海岸附近的浅滩中。一旦选定栖息地，它们便会顽固地留守于此，无论附近是否有社群居住。凭借强大的肉体力量与扭曲魔法的能力，一旦扎根，蜗魄龛君便极难被驱逐。它们只回应实力——唯有在战斗中击败它们，才能获得其勉强的合作。然而，一旦蜗魄龛君恢复力量，它们必然会背叛任何临时同盟。
Vaspercham.allSaves: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Magic-Warping Aura.name: 魔法扭曲灵光 Magic-Warping Aura
Magic-Warping Aura.description:
30尺。蜗魄龛君的外壳会扭曲周遭的魔法。任何在灵光范围内施法的生物必须尝试@Check[will|dc:37]豁免。

大成功 法术不受影响，而且施法者在1分钟内临时免疫魔法扭曲灵光。

成功 法术不受影响，但是如果法术允许豁免，那么蜗魄龛君会在对抗该法术的豁免中获得+1环境加值。

失败 若法术具有目标，且法术范围内有一个或多个可行的目标，那么该法术的目标会改变，由GM随机判定。若范围内没有其他可用目标，或者法术没有目标，则该法术被中断。

大失败 施法者转而施放另一个法术，从施法者的法术库、已准备法术或者可用的聚能法术（视情况而定）中随机选择并且随机选取法术的目标。

Hallucinatory Brine.name: 致幻海水 Hallucinatory Brine
Hallucinatory Brine.description: 被蜗魄龛君的打击或者涡心潮命中的生物必须尝试@Check[fortitude|dc:38]豁免。豁免失败时，这些生物会被幻觉淹没，在1轮内陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]，大失败时为1分钟

Mindwarping Tide.name: 涡心潮 Mindwarping Tide
Mindwarping Tide.description: 蜗魄龛君从她的壳中释放出有毒液体。@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]范围内的生物必须尝试豁免对抗蜗魄龛君的致幻海水。

Whipping Tentacles.name: 触手乱打 Whipping Tentacles
Whipping Tentacles.description: 蜗魄龛君作出4次触手打击，每次打击对抗不同的目标。这些攻击会计入蜗魄龛君的多重攻击减值，但是直至蜗魄龛君作出上述所有攻击之后，多重攻击减值才会增加。

Air of Sickness.name: Air of Sickness
Air of Sickness.description:
30 feet. A creature entering or starting its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:33|options:inflicts:sickened] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} and takes a –2 status penalty to saves made to resist diseases and remove the sickened condition for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.XSXMGb5h4Um6YXiT]{Effect: Air of Sickness}

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The nosferatu transforms into a swarm of pale-gray rats. They gain a land Speed of 30 feet and a climb Speed of 10 feet, and they become Large. In this swarm form, the nosferatu can take an action to deal each enemy in the swarm's space @Damage[2d10[piercing]|options:area-damage] damage with a @Check[reflex|basic|dc:36|options:area-effect] save. A creature that fails its save is also exposed to plague of ancients.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Command Thrall.name: Command Thrall
Command Thrall.description:
Requirements One of the nosferatu's thralls is present and can hear the nosferatu

Effect The nosferatu gives a single command to one of their thralls, which the thrall follows to the best of its ability during its next turn.

Dominate.name: Dominate
Dominate.description: The nosferatu can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} at will as a divine innate spell. Casting it requires staring into the target's eyes, giving the spell the visual trait. The save DC uses a high DC for the nosferatu's level, and a creature that succeeds is temporarily immune to that nosferatu's Dominate for 24 hours. Fully destroying the nosferatu ends the domination, but merely reducing the nosferatu to 0 HP is insufficient to break the spell.

Drink Blood.name: Drink Blood
Drink Blood.description:
Requirements The nosferatu's last action was a successful fangs Strike

Effect The nosferatu sinks their fangs into the targeted creature to drink its blood. This requires an @Check[athletics|against:fortitude] check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and the nosferatu regains @Damage[21[healing]]{21 HP}, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points. Drinking Blood from a creature that's already drained doesn't restore any HP to the nosferatu but increases the creature's drained condition value by 1, killing the victim when it reaches @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 5}. A nosferatu can also consume blood that's been emptied into a vessel for sustenance, but they gain no HP from doing so.

The target creature's drained condition value decreases by 1 per week. A blood transfusion, which requires a successful @Check[medicine|dc:20] check and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drained value by 1 after 10 minutes.

Nosferatu Vulnerabilities.name: Nosferatu Vulnerabilities
Nosferatu Vulnerabilities.description:
• Revulsion A nosferatu can't voluntarily come within 10 feet of brandished garlic or a brandished religious symbol of a deity with a holy sanctification option. To brandish garlic or a religious symbol, a creature must Interact to do so for 1 round (similar to Raising a Shield). If the nosferatu involuntarily comes within 10 feet of an object of their revulsion, they gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition, running from the object of their revulsion until they end an action beyond 10 feet. After 1 round of being exposed to the subject of their revulsion, a nosferatu can attempt a @Check[will|dc:25|traits:concentrate] save as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. On a success, they overcome their revulsions for [[/gmr 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6 rounds} (or 1 hour on a critical success).
  • Stake A magical wooden stake (such as one affected by a weapon potency rune, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]{Runic Weapon}, or similar magic) driven through the nosferatu's heart drops the nosferatu to 0 HP and prevents them from healing above 0 HP, even in their coffin. Staking a nosferatu requires 3 actions and works only if the nosferatu is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. If the stake is removed, the nosferatu can heal above 0 HP again, and if they're in their coffin, the 1-hour rest period begins once the stake is removed. If the nosferatu's head is severed and anointed with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water} while the stake is in place, the nosferatu is destroyed.

  • Sunlight If exposed to direct sunlight, a nosferatu immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. The slowed value increases by 1 each time the nosferatu ends their turn in sunlight, and the condition ends when they're no longer in sunlight. If the nosferatu loses all their actions in this way, they're destroyed.

Paralytic Fear.name: Paralytic Fear
Paralytic Fear.description:
Requirements The nosferatu overlord's last action was a successful claw Strike

Effect The nosferatu drags the target of the Strike close and freezes its mind in terror. The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:33|options:inflicts:frightened,inflicts:immobilized,inflicts:restrained] save with a moderate DC for the nosferatu's level.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} by fear until the end of the nosferatu's next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} and takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its Fortitude DC against the nosferatu's Drink Blood ability until the end of the nosferatu's next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Plague of Ancients.name: Plague of Ancients
Plague of Ancients.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:36]

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} (1 day)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}, drained 3, and enfeebled 3 (1 day)

Stage 5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} (1 day)

Stage 6 death

Plagued Coffin Restoration.name: Plagued Coffin Restoration
Plagued Coffin Restoration.description: Unlike other undead, a nosferatu isn't destroyed at 0 HP. Instead, they disperse into an immense number of rats heading in every direction in an attempt to return to their coffin. If even a single rat reaches the coffin, the nosferatu can recover. A nosferatu regains their strength through resting in earth taken from the grave of a creature that died of plague. If their body rests in their earth-filled coffin for 1 hour, the nosferatu gains 1 HP, after which their fast healing begins to function normally. If the coffin doesn't contain this plagued grave dirt, they instead need to rest in their coffin for 1 day before they gain 1 HP and regain their fast healing.

Water Wisp.name: Water Wisp
Water Wisp.publicNotes:
Water wisps are swimming spheres of foam and water, perpetually humming with a wash of soft sounds. They're gentle, nurturing, and quick to help anyone in need.

Wisps are tiny elemental beings that emerged during the creation of the Elemental Planes. The first wisps roamed the Inner Sphere in shifting symphonies that traded members with their every meeting. These symphonies of free wisps created music out of their combined resonances, but when the wicked Elemental Lords realized the value of the wisps' resonance, they captured whole symphonies for use as servants.

Wisps attune to each other and to those they surround themselves with. This attunement makes them naturally supportive allies. Free wisps still roam the Inner Sphere and the Universe, but they're usually shy and hide themselves from strangers. However, they happily offer their service to those who show them kindness. They especially find themselves drawn to spellcasters who practice elemental magic; these wisps usually watch from afar but sometimes approach those who seem safe to become familiars or comrades.

Free wisps who find one another become close almost immediately. They get especially excited when they find wisps of elements other than their own, showing none of the animosity sometimes exhibited between elementals of different planes. Instead, they join in an excited dance, emitting resonances that faintly echo the symphonies of ancient days.

Mist Vision.name: Mist Vision
Mist Vision.description: The water wisp ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from mist and fog.

Accord Essence.name: Accord Essence
Accord Essence.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet that benefited from the wisp's resonance in the last hour is targeted by an attack

Effect The wisp detonates themself in an elemental explosion. This grants temporary Hit Points equal to half the wisp's current Hit Points to allies within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} who have benefited from the wisp's resonance in the last hour. These temporary Hit Points last 1 hour.

A wisp that uses this reaction is permanently destroyed, and they can be restored by only a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} ritual or similarly powerful effect. If an ability would prevent the wisp's destruction (for instance, if the wisp is summoned and would merely be dismissed), Accord Essence has no effect.

Resonance.name: Resonance
Resonance.description:
30 feet. All wisps vibrate at a frequency attuned to their element, resonating with and empowering all creatures and effects sharing that trait.

A creature in the area gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for effects with the air trait; a creature with the elemental and air traits gains this bonus to all attack and damage rolls.

Drench.name: Drench
Drench.description: The wisp puts out all fires in a single 5-foot square. They extinguish non-magical fire of that size or smaller automatically and attempt to counteract magical fires (counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+6 #Counteract]]{+6}).

In Concert.name: In Concert
In Concert.description: When a water wisp rolls a critical failure on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid}, they get a failure instead, and when they roll a success, they get a critical success instead.

Emperor Cobra.name: 帝王眼镜蛇 Emperor Cobra
Emperor Cobra.publicNotes:
这些好斗的蛇出没于沼泽和低地。尽管它们身长超过16尺，体重超过200磅，但它们能在几秒钟内爬上树。帝王眼镜蛇通过张开头冠并对攻击者发出嘶嘶声来让捕食者知难而退。

不同种类的蛇都能在每一个非极地的生态系统中茁壮成长，每一种蛇都有自己独特的捕猎方式和防御机制。

Emperor Cobra Venom.name: 帝王眼镜蛇毒液 Emperor Cobra Venom
Emperor Cobra Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[fortitude|dc:22]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d8[poison]]伤害（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[1d8[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失Drained 2}（1轮）

Flare Hood.name: 张开头冠 Flare Hood
Flare Hood.description:
帝王眼镜蛇张开它的头冠。所有@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]范围内的非帝王眼镜蛇的生物都必须尝试1次@Check[will|dc:22]豁免。然后这些生物在1分钟内内对此能力临时免疫。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}

失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}

大失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}

Kelpie.name: Kelpie
Kelpie.publicNotes: Kelpies are malevolent, amphibious fey shapechangers who lure mortals to a watery grave. These cruel predators lurk around bodies of water of any type, only slightly preferring fresh water over salt water. Kelpies lure or drag their prey underwater, then drown and devour them, leaving behind only the victim's heart and liver—the only parts of a meal kelpies find unpleasant—tossed upon the shore. Kelpies are fond of magically disguising themselves as fine steeds or attractive strangers to draw in victims, but their true appearance is that of a hideous equine with slimy, green flesh resembling aquatic plants.

Captivating Lure.name: Captivating Lure
Captivating Lure.description:
The kelpie instills an overwhelming attraction to itself within the mind of a single creature within 60 feet. The target perceives the kelpie as a desirable person (if the kelpie is in humanoid form) or a magnificent steed (if the kelpie is in equine form) and must attempt a @Check[will|dc:23] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Captivating Lure for 24 hours.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round and is then temporarily immune to Captivating Lure for 24 hours.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}, and it must spend each of its actions to move closer to the kelpie as expediently as possible while avoiding obvious dangers. If a captivated creature is adjacent to the kelpie, it either attempts to mount the kelpie (if the kelpie is in equine form) or stays still and doesn't act. If the creature is attacked by the kelpie, or if it can't breathe water and enters an area of water, the creature is freed from captivation at the end of the kelpie's turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target doesn't consider water a danger and will enter an area of water even if it can't swim or breathe water. If it is attacked by the kelpie or starts to drown, it can attempt a new save at the start of its next turn, but it isn't freed automatically.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The kelpie can take on the appearance of any Medium or Large animal of an equine nature (such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.CLf9k9A9ApTAkZeL]{Horse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.CHVMOXznjUDcb3XP]{Hippocampus}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.F3ungAqpGjFotwUK]{Pony}), or any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change its Speeds or its attack and damage modifiers with its Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Radiant Warden.name: Radiant Warden
Radiant Warden.publicNotes:
The enigmatic and strange radiant wardens were constructed thousands of years ago to protect observatories and scholars against the incursion of alien aggressors from the Dominion of the Black. Over time, their roles as guardians expanded to include watching over any region where the laws of time and space have worn thin, particularly near portals and permanent gates between planets, planes, or dimensions.

Named for both the radial nature of the concentric rings that make up their bodies as well as the glowing radiance of their attacks, radiant wardens carry on their orders, defending sites from invasion with single-minded purpose.

Gatekeeper Aura.name: Gatekeeper Aura
Gatekeeper Aura.description: 60 feet. A creature that uses a teleportation ability within the aura's emanation or enters it via a teleportation ability must succeed a @Check[will|dc:38|options:area-effect,inflicts:sickened] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} and have its destination changed to a point of the radiant warden's choosing within the aura. On a successful save, the creature arrives as intended but is still sickened 1.

Orrery.name: Orrery
Orrery.description: Until it acts, the radiant warden appears to be an orrery (or similar large mechanical contraption, such as a telescope). It has an automatic result of 53 on Deception checks and DCs to convincingly pass as such a machine.

Radiant Blast.name: Radiant Blast
Radiant Blast.description: The radiant warden releases a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] of bright energy that deals @Damage[10d12[force]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic|options:area-effect] save). The radiant warden can't use Radiant Blast for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Radiant Blast]]{1d4 rounds}.

Radiant Blow.name: Radiant Blow
Radiant Blow.description: When a creature is hit by the radiant warden's hammer Strike, a flash of radiant energy attempts to anchor the creature in place. The creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:38|options:inflicts:blinded] save; on a failure, the creature can't use any teleportation effects for 1 minute. On a critical failure, the creature is also permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}.

Hound of Tindalos.name: Hound of Tindalos
Hound of Tindalos.publicNotes:
Lean and athirst, the hounds of Tindalos are drawn to those who tamper with the flow of time, travel through time, or use magic or rare alchemical drugs to send their thoughts or perception backward or forward in time. Powerful spellcasters can draw them from the Dimension of Time via rare rituals, but doing so attracts the hounds' ire, so few who traffic in such rituals live long enough to spread their knowledge. While the hounds possess great cunning and cruel intellect, they rarely interact with other creatures—other than to hunt and destroy those who've attracted their unblinking attention.

Once a hound catches the scent of a mortal to hunt, it calls others of its ilk. The pack then pursues its victim through all space and time until it catches, slays, and devours them. Those pursued can escape only by avoiding all angles, as hounds of Tindalos could step through them from nothingness at any time.

Otherworldly Mind.name: Otherworldly Mind
Otherworldly Mind.description: Whenever a creature targets the hound with a mental effect, that creature takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage (@Check[will|dc:25|basic] save). On a critical failure, it also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Ripping Gaze.name: Ripping Gaze
Ripping Gaze.description:
30 feet. The hound of Tindalos's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to rip open in the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature ends its turn in the aura's emanation, it takes @Damage[4d6[slashing]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:25|basic] save).

A creature that critically succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Vulnerable to Curved Space.name: Vulnerable to Curved Space
Vulnerable to Curved Space.description:
When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90º (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. It can't recover from this sickened condition, but the condition ends automatically once the hound is again adjacent to a suitable angle.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.V60TWjo1G1r5ZtPM]{Effect: Vulnerable to Curved Space}

Angled Entry.name: Angled Entry
Angled Entry.description:
The hound of Tindalos casts a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Translocate} spell, but it must transport itself into a space adjacent to an angle of 90° (or more acute) in the structure or environment around it. For example, it could teleport to a space adjacent to a wall (using the angle between the wall and floor) or a corner in a room, or adjacent to a sizable tree growing straight up out of the ground, but not to a flat plain or a room with only curved corners and edges.

Once per day, the hound can use this ability to interplanar teleport to or from the Dimension of Time, with the same restrictions on what angles it can appear next to.

Hellbound Attorney.name: Hellbound Attorney
Hellbound Attorney.publicNotes:
The Hellbound attorney sought the assistance of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.3QyqHIuAXE3YVLUh]{Phistophilus}-one of Hell's contract devils-to bolster her legalistic ability on the Universe.

There are countless legions of lawful fiends in the nine layers of Hell, warring against the celestial planes and scouring the Material Plane for souls to corrupt.

Abrogation of Consequences.name: Abrogation of Consequences
Abrogation of Consequences.description:
Trigger The Hellbound attorney rolls a success or critical failure on a saving throw against a linguistic effect.

Effect The attorney finds a loophole in the wording of the effect, turning the success into a critical success or a critical failure into a normal failure.

Opening Statement.name: Opening Statement
Opening Statement.description:
Trigger The Hellbound attorney's turn begins.

Effect The attorney enumerates the alleged crimes of a creature they can see and attempts a @Check[legal-lore|against:will] check against that creature's Will DC.

On a success, the attorney's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage (4d6 precision damage on a critical success) to the creature until the end of the attorney's turn.

Animate Dream.name: Animate Dream
Animate Dream.publicNotes:
An animate dream coalesces from centuries of stray fragments of reverie and dream left behind as slumbering minds drift through the Dimension of Dreams. In most cases, these fragments simply disperse on their own, but when dreamers flee from nightmares back to the waking world, these fragments can take on a supernatural life of their own. They have little reasoning and intent except to seek similar fragments, absorb them, and grow. When enough of them gather together, they merge into a horrific form as an animate dream.

Individually, animate dreams can hold a wide range of appearances, but most take on rudimentary shapes akin to the living forms of the minds that spawned them. Animate dreams that rise from slumbering humanoids, the most commonly encountered, thus appear humanoid, but with distorted, nightmarish shapes that incorporate additional twisted limbs and frightening features. In these forms, animate dreams find their way out of the Dreamlands and into the waking world, only to discover they have no way of returning and suffer a relentless hunger that only new nightmares can sate.

An animate dream thrives on the terror fueled by nightmares and fear and uses its supernatural abilities to invoke such feelings in the minds of its victims, cursing its prey by creating a permanent link to that individual's dreams. Thereafter, the victim is subjected to all manner of reoccurring nightmares. As the nightmares continue, the victim finds it more and more difficult to remain awake. In the end, the victim plunges into an accursed slumber from which it cannot return. These victims provide the animate dream with the purest form of fear and are its preferred sustenance.

An animate dream can subsist on the ambient fear generated by regular nightmares, but these lesser fears aren't as satisfying, often driving the animate dream to seek out new victims. Left without a source of fear, an animate dream won't starve to death, but it will grow increasingly violent and desperate. Famished animate dreams are the ones most often encountered, as they have been forced to abandon subtlety to pursue more blatant methods of harvesting fear. Yet such animate dreams also tend to be the least powerful of their kind. Those who have grown metaphysically fat on fear have generally done so by adopting a specific nightmare theme, such as being buried alive, being swept away by ocean waves, or being consumed by wild beasts. Such animate dreams often have similarly themed innate spells to augment their powers.
Animate Dream.allSaves: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Endless Nightmare.name: Endless Nightmare
Endless Nightmare.description:
An animate dream's touch fills the victim's mind with terrifying visions

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:26]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 day)

Stage 2 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 The victim falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} and can't be awakened as long as they remain at this stage (1 day).

Aqudel.name: Aqudel
Aqudel.publicNotes: Aqudels are obsessed with control. They consider everything around them open to manipulation, and their position in the alghollthu hierarchy leads them to lord over networks of ugothols or small, established societies that they often bully and exploit from the shadows. Aqudels answer only to vidileths, following their commands with a combination of simpering compliance and scheming distrust.

Barbed Cirri.name: Barbed Cirri
Barbed Cirri.description: The aqudel makes up to four cirrus Strikes, each against a diferent target. These attacks count toward the aqudel's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after they makes all of their attacks.

Strobe.name: Strobe
Strobe.description:
The aqudel changes the intensity and pattern of their skin in a rapid pulse, attempting to disorient any creatures that can see them. Creatures within 30 feet of the aqudel must attempt a @Check[will|dc:25|options:area-effect,inflicts:dazzled,inflicts:stunned] save. The aqudel can't use Strobe again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Strobe]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The target is dazzled for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure The target is dazzled for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}

Allosaurus.name: 异特龙 Allosaurus
Allosaurus.publicNotes: 异特龙是一种超大型的双足恐龙，专为捕猎大型猎物而生。它们拥有修长强健的双腿，独特的铰链式下颌能张开足以攻击比自己更高大的生物，更能以骇人般的轻松姿态吞噬小型猎物。短小的前肢末端缀有锋利如剃刀的爪子，粗壮的尾巴在危急时刻能挥出强力扫击进行防御。偶尔，异特龙会组成小型群体生活狩猎，协同捕杀特别庞大的猎物。但它们更倾向于占据专属领地，独享其中的猎物。已知猎物包括雷龙、剑龙，若异特龙误入无防护的农田，连成群的家畜也难逃其口。

Serrated Teeth.name: 锯齿利牙 Serrated Teeth
Serrated Teeth.description:
触发 一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]于异特龙的颚的生物，成功通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]检定

效果 当敌人试图挣脱时，异特龙用锯齿状的牙齿狠狠一咬，造成@Damage[2d6[slashing]]伤害。

Unexpected Ambush.name: 意外伏击 Unexpected Ambush
Unexpected Ambush.description:
需求 异特龙对于40尺内至少一个生物处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]

效果 异特龙向前冲刺，将毫无防备的猎物撞倒在地。异特龙朝需求的生物行走至多其速度的距离，进入其尾打击触及内的一处未被占据的空间。异特龙对该敌人进行一次尾打击。如果打击命中，异特龙以一个自由动作自动成功将目标击倒。

Shriezyx.name: Shriezyx
Shriezyx.publicNotes:
Long ago, Thassilonian wizards created shriezyx in twisted experiments to act as guards and test subjects. These 300-pound aberrations have outlived their creators and mostly make their homes inside Thassilonian ruins, caverns, and deep in the Darklands. Their bodies are covered in hard, extremely flammable chitin that molts as they grow.

While a shriezyx looks like a bestial, three-eyed spider, the truth behind these creatures is far more grotesque. Instead of spinning silk, a shriezyx spits strands of unformed, sticky flesh from its mouth. When fresh, theses fleshy strands are coated in a nerve-numbing toxin that slows prey. The weblike flesh-spittle coats shriezyx lairs and nests, wrapped around the bones for their former meals. Fortunately for those who stumble into these lairs, a shriezyx's toxin dissipates when exposed to air, leaving the fleshy webs only sickeningly sticky. Unfortunately for those same travelers, shriezyx are often communal creatures that gather in large numbers and are quick to attack intruders.

Deros and other subterranean peoples sometimes keep shriezyx as guards or mounts, using food and threats of fire to keep them in line. Most shriezyx owners are quick to dispose of any eggs, fearing a swarm could grow beyond their control, but some breeders have realized that a shriezyx's offspring retain much of its parent's demeanor and save the eggs of the most loyal (or most fire-fearing) shriezyx in hopes of creating a profitable, easier-to-control herd. While crueler masters might use shriezyx as test subjects, alchemists often see these creatures as beloved pets. Their grotesque webs make great alchemical reagents and provide ethically sourced flesh for experiments, while the molted exoskeleton can be used to create bombs and other explosives.
Shriezyx.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. mental

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Mental.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

Pyrophobia.name: Pyrophobia
Pyrophobia.description: If the shriezyx takes fire damage or starts its turn within 30 feet of a fire at least the size of a torch, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Clicking Scurry.name: Clicking Scurry
Clicking Scurry.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The shriezyx Strides or Climbs, and then makes a claw Strike.

Flash Web.name: Flash Web
Flash Web.description: The shriezyx's shoots a fleshy web at a target within 30 feet. The target must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:20] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and exposed to numbing toxin. Due to the grotesque nature of the webbing, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} and can't reduce its sickened condition until it Escapes (DC 20).

Numbing Toxin.name: Numbing Toxin
Numbing Toxin.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:20]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d4[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[1d8[poison]] damage, clumsy 2, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Denizen of Leng.name: Denizen of Leng
Denizen of Leng.publicNotes:
Travelers and raiders from the cold, windswept dimension of Leng, these malevolent human-shaped creatures range across reality in ominous black ships capable of sailing beyond the borders of dimensions and planes. Although most denizens of Leng seek conquest and riches, others operate as self-styled ambassadors and merchants, sowing discord with far-ranging plots. While the inscrutable denizens dress themselves in flowing robes, veils, and broad turbans to appear human, their aberrant physiology, when glimpsed, is evident from their crown of stubby horns and tentacled jaws to their furry, goat-like legs.

Denizens of Leng are often highly intelligent and can be found advising or nudging both the powerful and the meek alike. If there is any purpose to this beyond an individual Denizen of Leng's own interests, there has so far been no sign. Most appear to be perfectly genuine with their counsel, though generally lacking in anything resembling morality.

Above the fierce captains who command the infamous black ships is an even higher caste of denizens of Leng. These occultists and musicians serve as high priests, laboring to appease the frightening gods who look down upon the Nightmare Realm with cold malice.

Planar Fast Healing.name: Planar Fast Healing
Planar Fast Healing.description:
A denizen of Leng maintains a connection to Leng at all times, and when away from Leng, they have fast healing 5. They lose this ability on Leng or in areas where planar connections do not function. If killed, their body dissolves into nothingness in [[/gmr 1d4 #Dissolve Body]]{1d4 rounds}, leaving behind their equipment. A slain denizen reforms in Leng; they can be permanently killed only when their planar fast healing doesn't function.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FastHealing]

No Breath.name: No Breath
No Breath.description: Denizens of Leng don't need to breathe.

Debilitating Bite.name: Debilitating Bite
Debilitating Bite.description: A creature that takes damage from a denizen's bite must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}. Each time a target fails an additional save against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of Clumsy 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

Leng Ruby.name: Leng Ruby
Leng Ruby.description: Many denizens of Leng carry strange rubies mined from quarries in Leng. As long as a creature holds a Leng ruby that it willingly accepted as a gift or payment from a denizen of Leng, any denizen of Leng can target that creature with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Mind Reading}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]{Outcast's Curse}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain} at a range of 1 mile, and the bearer uses an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw against outcast's curse.

Despair Dragon (Adult, Spellcaster).name: 成年绝望龙施法者 Despair Dragon (Adult, Spellcaster)
Despair Dragon (Adult, Spellcaster).publicNotes: 恐惧是最强烈的情感之一，而绝望龙是将恐惧和绝望之情引导为自己利益的高手。像其他异能龙一样，绝望龙也有一种与生俱来的冲动，那就是激起他人的恐惧。绝望龙通常会定居在城镇附近，以便从周围的恐惧中汲取力量。绝望龙的财宝中最常见的物品是卷轴、典籍和遗物，这些物品是它们研究的材料。通过这些，绝望龙能了解到当地的民间传说、都市传说等，从而更好地困扰它们的目标。

Fearsense.name: 恐惧感知 Fearsense
Fearsense.description: 绝望龙能够感知所有处于惊惧状态的生物，范围如上所述。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Occult.name: 对抗异能的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Occult

Consume Fear.name: 吞噬恐惧 Consume Fear
Consume Fear.description:
触发 绝望龙60尺内的一个生物失去惊惧状态

效果 绝望龙从失去惊惧状态的生物体内汲取恐惧，获得5d8临时生命值，持续1分钟。

Unbidden Thoughts.name: 无声思绪 Unbidden Thoughts
Unbidden Thoughts.description:
触发 绝望龙被武器或无武装攻击重击

效果 攻击者的心智被关于他们最深层恐惧的幻象所占据，导致感官超负荷。攻击者必须选择以下结果之一：该次攻击变为普通成功，或者该次攻击保持重击但攻击者陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

Shrieking Breath.name: 尖叫吐息 Shrieking Breath
Shrieking Breath.description: 绝望龙发出由它从恐惧敌人那里汲取的尖叫所组成的刺耳音波，在@Template[type:cone|distance:40]范围内造成@Damage[12d6[sonic]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[will|dc:33|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。 豁免失败的生物必须在下一回合开始时将第一个动作用于尖叫。绝望龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Shrieking Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用尖叫吐息。

Tongue Decoy.name: 舌头诱饵 Tongue Decoy
Tongue Decoy.description:
绝望龙将其舌尖的数个囊泡充气，以制造出一个生物的基本形态。这个过程需要1分钟才能完成，在此期间绝望龙处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]状态。如果绝望龙在此过程中停止或被打断，囊泡会泄气，绝望龙必须重新开始。一旦过程完成，绝望龙可以无限期保持充气状态，并且可以使用解消动作使囊泡泄气并收回舌头。

充气后的舌头呈现出动物或类人生物的基本形态，体型可以是小型或中型。该形态与生物的轮廓相似，但仔细检查并成功通过@Check[perception|dc:30]检定可以识别舌头的真面目。在充气时，绝望龙可以通过舌头发出声音，但保持舌头充气会让说话变得困难，导致绝望龙在任何与说话相关的检定上（如欺骗检定）受到-4环境减值。

绝望龙的舌头最多可以延伸90尺，并可以作为充气过程的一部分将舌头完全伸展。充气后的舌头部分可用一个动作（具有专注、操作和移动特征）将充气部分移动最多15尺。在延伸状态下，舌头的膨胀末端会占据一个相应体型生物的空间，但舌头的其余部分不会以任何方式阻碍或阻挡移动。绝望龙的灵敏嗅觉感觉可以通过舌尖的纤毛发挥作用，但除此之外，绝望龙没有其他途径感知舌头附近的事物。

攻击舌头视同攻击绝望龙本体，唯一不同的是舌头始终处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]状态。如果舌头受到任何伤害，它会立即泄气并保持延伸状态。绝望龙会在舌头延伸时持续处于措手不及状态，但可以通过连续两个交互动作来收回舌头。如果舌头受到伤害，绝望龙在1天内无法使用舌头诱饵。

Sea Snake.name: 海蛇 Sea Snake
Sea Snake.publicNotes:
这些柔软的蛇经常出没于热带海洋的浅水区。它们有4尺来长，长长的蓝绿色身体很容易藏在波涛中，依靠这一点潜伏在水中伏击猎物。海蛇毒性极强，但咬击时往往选择不注入毒液，因此与它们遭遇很少导致死亡。

传说中，更巨大的海蛇在更深的水域游弋，跟随着船只，等待水手落海，或者游到船边从甲板上捕食他们。

不同种类的蛇都能在每一个非极地的生态系统中茁壮成长，每一种蛇都有自己独特的捕猎方式和防御机制。

Lash Out.name: 猛咬一口 Lash Out
Lash Out.description:
触发 海蛇触及内的生物进行了1个移动动作

效果 海蛇对敌人进行1次尖牙打击。

Sea Snake Venom.name: 海蛇毒液 Sea Snake Venom
Sea Snake Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} （1轮）

Tylosaurus.name: 海王龙 Tylosaurus
Tylosaurus.publicNotes:
尽管体型庞大——有的甚至能超过40尺长——海王龙有着光滑的身躯和狭长的吻部。很少有生物能够在它们生存的环境中与之匹敌，因为其他大多数水生巨兽都栖息在更深的水域。

这种被称作沧龙的巨大水栖爬行动物用其强而有力的尾巴推动它们追捕猎物。四条有关节的带蹼鳍让它们可以精准控制方向，而它们那铰链式的下颌——就像蛇一样——让它们可以吞下比自己体型更大的生物。它们咽喉中的一组小的次生咽颚可以拉动食物以供更高效地消化。作为需要呼吸空气的动物，沧龙必须停留在水面附近，和鲸类争食。这种靠近水面的习性意味着它们经常会掀翻小船，尽情享用落水的船员。

Aquatic Drag.name: 拽入水中 Aquatic Drag
Aquatic Drag.description:
需求 海王龙使一个生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或束缚

效果 海王龙带着受擒或束缚于它的生物，游泳至多其速度一半距离。

Vicious Strafe.name: 凶猛掠袭 Vicious Strafe
Vicious Strafe.description: 海王龙游泳至多其速度距离，在移动中任意一点进行一次颚咬打击和一次尾扫打击，每次攻击不同目标。

Viper Swarm.name: 蝰蛇群 Viper Swarm
Viper Swarm.publicNotes:
那由闪烁鳞片、晶亮双眼与滴淌毒液的毒牙构成的骇人集群——蝰蛇群——已终结过无数不幸的冒险者。这些出了名凶悍的蛇通常夜间活动，会攻击任何进入攻击范围的物体——无论是肢体还是武器。它们的毒液是强效毒素，会让受害者浑身颤抖、虚弱无力。幸运的人可能会在遭到全力攻击前，先挨一次不带毒液的警告性攻击。

不同种类的蛇都能在每一个非极地的生态系统中茁壮成长，每一种蛇都有自己独特的捕猎方式和防御机制。

Venom Spritz.name: 毒液喷溅 Venom Spritz
Venom Spritz.description: 蝰蛇摆出防御姿态，从毒牙中喷射毒液。@Template[type:cone|distance:10]范围内的每个生物都暴露于辐射群毒液之下，但对抗毒素的豁免有+2环境加值。

Venomous Fangs.name: 毒牙 Venomous Fangs
Venomous Fangs.description: 集群占据空间内的每个敌人受到@Damage[2d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:21|basic]豁免）外加蝰蛇群毒液。

Viper Swarm Venom.name: 蝰蛇群毒液 Viper Swarm Venom
Viper Swarm Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d4[poison]]伤害（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[2d4[poison]]伤害，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1轮）

Brownie.name: Brownie
Brownie.publicNotes:
Brownies make their homes in the trunks of hollow trees, small earthy burrows, and even under porches or within the crawl spaces of farmhouses. Often attired in clothes that appear to be made of plants or leaves, brownies wear belts lined with pouches and tools. Whatever language they choose to speak is often is riddled with odd pronunciations and colloquialisms. Their manner of speaking might call upon turns of phrase that are decades or even centuries out of vogue, for example, or they might mix up their metaphors in strange ways. It almost seems as if brownies adopt these quirky ways of speaking intentionally-certainly they do not react favorably to corrections to their chatter. There's often no swifter way to annoy a brownie than to try to correct its grammar. Brownies stand barely 2 feet tall and weigh about 20 pounds.

When facing danger, brownies rarely engage in combat, preferring instead to confound and confuse their attackers in order to buy enough time for escape. Content with honest toil and the love of their kin, brownies maintain a pacifist nature, harassing creatures only to run them off or punish them for an insult. Despite this nature, all brownies carry a blade. They refer to their swords with a hint of disgust, and jokingly call their blades their "final trick," reserving their use for the direst of circumstances.

Honest to a fault, brownies take freely but always repay their debt through work or leave something behind as an offering. They may eat an apple from a farmer's orchard but harvest the entire tree as repayment. A brownie might eat an entire pie left on a windowsill, only to straighten up the kitchen or wash the dishes. A brownie can share a home with a family for years and years while avoiding detection. A family that is aware of a brownie in their midst usually finds this a beneficial relationship and leaves dishes of milk, pieces of fruit, trinkets, and sometimes even wine as gifts. In exchange, the resident brownie keeps the home clean, mends clothes, repairs tools, and shoos away vermin and small predators. Bragging about having a brownie in the house is the best way to lose one. Brownies distrust foxes and fear wolves, and they avoid farms with dogs.

Baffling Bluff.name: Baffling Bluff
Baffling Bluff.description:
The brownie's antics can confuse and disorient a creature. When the brownie uses Baffling Bluff, it targets a single creature within 30 feet; that creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:17] save.

The target is temporarily immune to Baffling Bluff for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is fooled momentarily and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the next melee Strike the brownie makes against it before the end of the brownie's next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is confused for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confused condition.

Shade (Plane of Earth).name: 残影（土元素位面） Shade (Plane of Earth)
Shade (Plane of Earth).publicNotes:
土魂灵的外观看起来像是由岩石或土组成的生前版本

当凡人死亡时，他们的灵魂将前往外环位面中的骨园（Boneyard），在那里接受死亡女神法莱斯玛的审判。一旦他们受到审判，他们的灵魂就会前往来世接受最终奖赏或惩罚，在这个过程中，他们会变成一种叫做"残影"的生物。这个过程会赋予这些灵魂一个新的身体，其身体的外形由它前往的位面的主要意识形态所塑造。残影的生前记忆几乎被抹去，只留下一些如同梦境般模糊的记忆碎片。无论残影生前的体型、力量或天性如何，他们在来世都是中型生物。

阴魂的存在可能会持续无数纪元，但这种状态并非一成不变的。神祇、浩瀚众界（Great Beyond）的居民、甚至位面本身都可能进一步转变残影的本质，通过将其转变为原始的精粹（quintessence），心魂要素（spiritual essence）被用于扩张位面的物理表征，或被转变为天族、魔族、观察者之类的新形态。如果残影死亡，他们的身体会在类似腐烂的过程中分解，他们的本质会回归至组成位面本身的精粹或元素中。这代表着灵魂之旅的真正终结——它们的生命精华与浩瀚众界的核心融为一体，被回收到创生熔炉中，为新灵魂的诞生提供能量。

Planar Incarnation - Plane of Earth (Ear.name: 土元素位面位面塑形（土魂灵） Planar Incarnation - Plane of Earth (Earth Pneuma)
Planar Incarnation - Plane of Earth (Ear.description:
所有残影都会被所在的位面塑造形体，并表现出位面的本质。他们的数据有如下调整。他们也可能获得和位面相关的生物特征。

土元素位面 Plane of Earth（"土魂灵"the Earth Pneuma） 土魂灵的外观看起来像是由岩石或土组成的生前版本

  • 语言 土元素语
  • 额外能力 掘地速度20尺
  • 近战 拳击+7（土），伤害 1d8+2钝击

Tyrannosaurus Skeleton.name: 暴龙骷髅 Tyrannosaurus Skeleton
Tyrannosaurus Skeleton.publicNotes:
这是由巨大的食肉恐龙制成的可怕骷髅。

在亡者的行列中，没有哪种不死有着如骷髅一般无穷的数量与种类。虽然大多数骷髅几乎完全由骨头构成，但少部分还保留着一些肉屑来帮助它们运动，比如翼膜。

Rib Skewer.name: 肋骨穿刺 Rib Skewer
Rib Skewer.description: 暴龙骷髅压下身子，试图用它的一根巨型肋骨刺穿一个相邻的生物。这个生物受到@Damage[(2d10+9)[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:28|basic]豁免）。如果生物豁免失败且它的体型为中型或更小，它还会被串在肋骨上。被串上的生物随着骷髅一起移动并承受@Damage[2d6[bleed]]伤害，直到它[[/act escape dc=28]]{逃脱}或者有人用[[/act force-open dc=28]]来破坏肋骨（两者DC皆为28）。

Shoki.name: 终葵囚魂使 Shoki
Shoki.publicNotes:
终葵囚魂使负责将迷途亡魂引向骨园（Boneyard）。它们以远赴凡人宇宙（有时甚至更远）追猎那些逃避法莱斯玛审判的灵魂为荣——无论对方是恶毒的敌人，还是不幸的亡灵。终葵囚魂使通常会被更强大的招魂者送到离猎物更近的地方，但在完成任务后，它们有能力返回原地。

终葵囚魂使的外形似年迈的类人生物：皮肤漆黑如墨，头顶盘曲着公羊角，背上驮着一枚巨大的蜗牛壳。有人认为终葵囚魂使会把灵魂存放在壳中带回骨园，但实际上，这种力量源自它们注入了魔法的手杖。

许多招魂者都与骨园的庞大官僚机构有着密切的联系。 很少人追求仁慈、正义或个人利益；他们对法莱斯玛和骨园的职责是至高无上的。然而，个别招魂者以不同的方式解释他们的职责，这可能使他们与凡人之间发生冲突。
Shoki.allSaves: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Infuse Staff.name: 注能手杖 Infuse Staff
Infuse Staff.description: 终葵囚魂使的手杖成为一根+1强击杖，并且只要终葵囚魂使还持握它，它的材质便如同精金一般。终葵囚魂使的手杖在被终葵囚魂使持握时有硬度14，HP56（BT28），它不再为终葵囚魂使所有时则为硬度5，HP20（BT10）。手杖被夺走或摧毁的终葵囚魂使可以通过1小时的劳作重新灌注一根。

Shepherd's Touch.name: 牧者之触 Shepherd's Touch
Shepherd's Touch.description: 终葵囚魂使的打击能如同具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R] 性能符文的效果一般影响虚体生物，对活物造成@Damage[2d6[void]]伤害，对不死生物造成@Damage[2d6[vitality]]伤害。

Soul Lock.name: 禁锢灵魂 Soul Lock
Soul Lock.description:
需求 终葵囚魂使的手杖里没有禁锢着灵魂

效果 终葵囚魂使试图捕获一个位于死亡边缘的生物的灵魂：要么是一个不死生物，要么是一个拥有濒死值的生物，要么是一个上1分钟前刚死的生物。目标必须进行@Check[will|dc:32]豁免，其结果如下：

大成功 生物不受影响并对禁锢灵魂临时免疫

成功 终葵囚魂使的手杖牵引着生物的灵魂却未能将其困住。若该生物为活物，则获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}（或使其毁灭状态值加1）；若该生物为实体不死生物，则获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}；若该生物为虚体不死生物，则获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}。此后该生物将临时免疫本能力，持续24小时。

失败 终葵囚魂使将该生物的灵魂囚禁于手杖中。若该生物为活物，则立刻死亡；若该生物为实体不死生物，则其躯体将变为无生命的尸骸。灵魂被禁锢期间，目标无法通过任何手段复活或复归不死，也无法通过任何手段使用复生能力——唯有祈愿术仪式等强大魔法才能破除此限制。若终葵囚魂使的手杖被摧毁或终葵囚魂使主动释放，灵魂便会重获自由。终葵囚魂使手杖一次仅能禁锢一个灵魂。

Shade (Heaven).name: 残影（七重天堂） Shade (Heaven)
Shade (Heaven).publicNotes:
晋升者的外观有金色光环和幽灵双翼，其他和生前一样

当凡人死亡时，他们的灵魂将前往外环位面中的骨园（Boneyard），在那里接受死亡女神法莱斯玛的审判。一旦他们受到审判，他们的灵魂就会前往来世接受最终奖赏或惩罚，在这个过程中，他们会变成一种叫做"残影"的生物。这个过程会赋予这些灵魂一个新的身体，其身体的外形由它前往的位面的主要意识形态所塑造。残影的生前记忆几乎被抹去，只留下一些如同梦境般模糊的记忆碎片。无论残影生前的体型、力量或天性如何，他们在来世都是中型生物。

阴魂的存在可能会持续无数纪元，但这种状态并非一成不变的。神祇、浩瀚众界（Great Beyond）的居民、甚至位面本身都可能进一步转变残影的本质，通过将其转变为原始的精粹（quintessence），心魂要素（spiritual essence）被用于扩张位面的物理表征，或被转变为天族、魔族、观察者之类的新形态。如果残影死亡，他们的身体会在类似腐烂的过程中分解，他们的本质会回归至组成位面本身的精粹或元素中。这代表着灵魂之旅的真正终结——它们的生命精华与浩瀚众界的核心融为一体，被回收到创生熔炉中，为新灵魂的诞生提供能量。

Planar Incarnation - Heaven (The Elect).name: 七重天堂位面塑形（晋升者） Planar Incarnation - Heaven (The Elect)
Planar Incarnation - Heaven (The Elect).description:
所有残影都会被所在的位面塑造形体，并表现出位面的本质。他们的数据有如下调整。他们也可能获得和位面相关的生物特征。

七重天堂 Heaven（"晋升者" the Elect） 晋升者的外观有金色光环和幽灵双翼，其他和生前一样

  • 祝佑 圣洁
  • 语言 天界语
  • 额外能力 飞行速度20尺
  • 近战 翼击+7，伤害 1d8+2钝击

Nasurgeth.name: Nasurgeth
Nasurgeth.publicNotes:
Nasurgeths are hungry voids with glowing eyestalks and thousands of teeth. They lurk deep beneath the waves where the sunlight doesn't reach. At night, they ascend to the skies and rain destruction and ruin down on all the living.

Darvakkas, also called nightshades, are a ravenous evil made up of equal parts darkness and malice. Originally creatures of the Outer Planes who travel to the convergence of the Shadow Plane and the Void—where the power of nothingness obliterates them—these undead abominations are the physical embodiment of entropy. They burn with an intense hatred for all life, working to bring a final, dark night to the Material Plane where nothing but ash and ice remain.

As creatures twisted by darkness and shadow, darvakkas have a great aversion to sunlight and all sources of vitality energy. On the Material Plane, they spend the hours of daylight hidden below ground, amid ruins, or submerged deep in the ocean's darkest chasms beyond the reach of the sun's rays, emerging when darkness shelters them overhead.

Darvakkas have an aura of entropy that attracts undead thralls to serve as warriors and heralds. They rarely seek alliances with each other or other creatures, existing in solitude as the heads of individual armies of the dead.

Midnight Depths.name: Midnight Depths
Midnight Depths.description: 60 feet. A nasurgeth's entropy grows even stronger underwater. All water within the aura is completely dark (as 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness}). Magical light with a counteract rank of 4th level or lower, along with magical light cantrips, are suppressed. A living creature entering or starting its turn in the aura takes @Damage[4d6[void]] damage, and the creature also takes an additional @Damage[2d10[cold]] damage if it's in water (@Check[fortitude|dc:39|basic]). If it fails, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute and pulled 10 feet toward the nasurgeth.

Spray Black Bile.name: Spray Black Bile
Spray Black Bile.description:
Trigger The nasurgeth takes slashing or piercing damage from a critical hit, or a swallowed creature cuts itself free

Effect Darkness and void energy spill out from the nasurgeth's wound, dealing @Damage[8d8[void]] damage to creatures within 20 feet (@Check[fortitude|dc:40|basic]).

Sunlight Powerlessness.name: Sunlight Powerlessness
Sunlight Powerlessness.description: A nasurgeth caught in sunlight is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}.

Broken Barb.name: Broken Barb
Broken Barb.description:
Requirements A creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} in the nasurgeth's jaws

Effect The nasurgeth breaks a tooth off in the target, who takes @Damage[3d10[bleed]] and is no longer grabbed or restrained. If the target is adjacent to a surface, the tooth also pins it in place, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} ([[/act escape dc=45]]).

Ravenous Void.name: Ravenous Void
Ravenous Void.description: The nasurgeth barrels forward with their mouth open, Swimming twice in a straight line and moving through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures. The nasurgeth deals the damage of their jaws Strike to each creature whose space they enter (@Check[reflex|dc:45|basic]). Any creature that critically fails is automatically Swallowed Whole.

Swallow Whole.name: Swallow Whole
Swallow Whole.description:
Huge, @Damage[(2d10+9)[bludgeoning]], Rupture 40

A living creature that ends its turn swallowed whole by a nasurgeth becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} or increases its drained condition by 1, and the nasurgeth gains 20 temporary Hit Points. A creature whose drained condition increases to 5 in this way dies.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

Despair Dragon (Young, Spellcaster).name: 青年绝望龙施法者 Despair Dragon (Young, Spellcaster)
Despair Dragon (Young, Spellcaster).publicNotes: 恐惧是最强烈的情感之一，而绝望龙是将恐惧和绝望之情引导为自己利益的高手。像其他异能龙一样，绝望龙也有一种与生俱来的冲动，那就是激起他人的恐惧。绝望龙通常会定居在城镇附近，以便从周围的恐惧中汲取力量。绝望龙的财宝中最常见的物品是卷轴、典籍和遗物，这些物品是它们研究的材料。通过这些，绝望龙能了解到当地的民间传说、都市传说等，从而更好地困扰它们的目标。

Fearsense.name: 恐惧感知 Fearsense
Fearsense.description: 绝望龙能够感知所有处于惊惧状态的生物，范围如上所述。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Occult.name: 对抗异能的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Occult

Consume Fear.name: 吞噬恐惧 Consume Fear
Consume Fear.description:
触发 绝望龙60尺内的一个生物失去惊惧状态

效果 绝望龙从失去惊惧状态的生物体内汲取恐惧，获得4d8临时生命值，持续1分钟。

Unbidden Thoughts.name: 无声思绪 Unbidden Thoughts
Unbidden Thoughts.description:
触发 绝望龙被武器或无武装攻击重击

效果 攻击者的心智被关于他们最深层恐惧的幻象所占据，导致感官超负荷。攻击者必须选择以下结果之一：该次攻击变为普通成功，或者该次攻击保持重击但攻击者陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

Shrieking Breath.name: 尖叫吐息 Shrieking Breath
Shrieking Breath.description: 绝望龙发出由它从恐惧敌人那里汲取的尖叫所组成的刺耳音波，在@Template[type:cone|distance:30]范围内造成@Damage[8d6[sonic]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[will|dc:28|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。 豁免失败的生物必须在下一回合开始时将第一个动作用于尖叫。绝望龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Shrieking Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用尖叫吐息。

Exscinder.name: 禁绝者 Exscinder
Exscinder.publicNotes: 凡人需要被守护，免受禁忌学问与异端经卷的玷染。无论它们现身哪一位面，禁绝者都会现身，随后索取、没收，并焚毁其中潜藏的危险思潮。作为节制美德的化身，禁绝者不断重申一条训诫：只有审慎的喉舌才能断绝秽邪的句字。尽管这番箴言在它们当中代代相传，禁绝者却很少将目光聚焦于俗世凡人。威胁并不必然来自习得者，而在于那亵渎学识本身。那是超越字句的蔓草，只有株连夷灭方能禁绝祸根。

Archon's Protection.name: 圣使护卫 Archon's Protection
Archon's Protection.description:
触发 一个敌人伤害圣使的盟友，且该敌人和该盟友皆距离圣使15尺内

效果 该盟友在对抗触发伤害时获得对全部伤害类型的15点抗力，圣使可对触发本能力的敌人进行一次打击。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.JZVSXgzu52tJGO6D]

Censorious Lash.name: 鞭恶斥邪 Censorious Lash
Censorious Lash.description: 当禁绝者使用链条打击命中一名生物时，该生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:30]豁免。若失败，则其下个回合的第一个动作由禁绝者控制（大失败则会被控制整个回合）。

Change Size.name: 变换形体 Change Size
Change Size.description: 禁绝者将体型变为超大型，大型，中型或小型。

Temper thy Words.name: 慎尔其言 Temper thy Words
Temper thy Words.description:
禁绝者选择120尺内某一书面文本。其不必处于视线之内，但也不能是被刻意@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]起来的状态。禁绝者会谨慎审查文本中的字句，并依照其意志进行适当的删改。修改后的文本不再能被调用，使其无法作为卷轴来施法、作为法术书来准备法术、或是作为学术期刊来参考。若该文本被某一生物携带，则该生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:33]豁免；而无主文本自动得到大失败结果。

大成功 该文本未被删改。

成功 该文本的删改持续1轮。

失败 该文本的删改持续1日。

大失败 该文本被永久性地删改，只有通过许愿术仪式或类似的强大魔法才能恢复原状。

Kuribu.name: 库利卜 Kuribu
Kuribu.publicNotes: 库利卜（Kuribus）是寺庙及其他圣地的守护者。它们外形似人，体型大致与人类孩童相当。其身躯如同岩石，这使得库利卜能长时间（有时长达数百年）伪装成雕像。在守卫其圣地时，库利卜会从远处袭扰入侵者。

Arrows.name: 箭 Arrows
Arrows.description: 这些箭头是弓的弹药。箭杆是木制的。一端是羽毛保持飞行中的平稳，另一端是金属头。

Immobilizing Ambush.name: 定身伏击 Immobilizing Ambush
Immobilizing Ambush.description:
需求 库利卜正伪装成一座雕像

触发 一个生物移动到库利卜60尺范围内

效果 库利卜迅猛出击，对触发的生物进行一次短弓打击。若打击命中，该生物将被箭矢钉住，效果如弓重击专精效果所述。

Sentinel's Aura.name: 哨卫灵光 Sentinel's Aura
Sentinel's Aura.description: 30尺。库利卜及灵光内任何共同守卫同一圣地的其他生物在AC上获得+1状态加值。当化为雕像能力生效时，此灵光被压制。

Blessed Aspect.name: 祝福圣容 Blessed Aspect
Blessed Aspect.description:
库利卜的面容变形，其圣容会根据库利卜选择的形态发动一次攻击。库利卜在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Blessed Aspect]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用祝福圣容。它可以在任何时候恢复其类人形态，但仍需等待才能再次使用祝福圣容。

  • 鹰 库利卜在@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内发出一声令人迷失方向的尖啸，造成@Damage[2d10[sonic]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[will|dc:19|basic]豁免）。大失败的生物还会被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。
  • 狮 库利卜对一个邻接生物进行一次强力的颚咬打击。该攻击的攻击调整值为@Check[kuribu-jaws-attack|against:ac]{+12}，造成@Damage[4d6[piercing],1d4[bleed]]伤害。

  • 牛 库利卜冲向一个生物。库利卜飞行或快步，在移动结束时，库利卜撞向一个邻接生物，对其造成@Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:17|basic]豁免）。若目标大失败，它还会被击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

Statue.name: 化为雕像 Statue
Statue.description: 直到下次行动前，库利卜看起来就像一座雕像。它在作为雕像进行伪装的欺骗检定和DC上自动获得29的结果。

Amphisbaena.name: Amphisbaena
Amphisbaena.publicNotes:
An amphisbaena is an exceedingly aggressive, venomous viper of remarkable size that bears two heads-one on each end of its body. It moves in a manner similar to that of the more common sidewinder snake, throwing its body forward in a loop and anchoring itself by keeping one head or the other on the ground at all times.

Amphisbaenas' typical prey includes rabbits, foxes, various birds, small deer, and even humanoids if presented the opportunity. Fiercely territorial by nature, they attack just about anything that gets near their lairs, regardless of the intruder's size. Many a child has been warned about going too far into the woods alone, lest they wander too close to an amphisbaena den and become the creature's next meal.

The venom of an amphisbaena is incredibly potent, able to take down a stout dwarf within minutes if left untreated. However, it also has uses in a variety of healing remedies, which makes it a valuable commodity if collected. For example, a pregnant person might be advised to drink the venom in small, dilute doses to help safeguard the pregnancy. Mixing small amounts of the venom with various herbs and oil creates a poultice which dulls aches and pains. As a result, the image of an amphisbaena appears in many contexts associated with healing and alchemical subjects, such as labels for tinctures, annotations in herbalists' records, and illustrations in textbooks of medicine.

The first amphisbaena is said to have formed from the blood that fell as a medusa's head was severed. This story's origin most likely stems from the fact that amphisbaenas are oddly immune to petrification, which in turn leads to them sometimes being kept as pets by a medusa. A medusa who keeps an amphisbaena as a pet might regard the viper as their most treasured companion or perhaps even as their own child. Despite these fabled supernatural origins and the occasional special treatment they receive, however, amphisbaenas are entirely mundane animals with only rudimentary intelligence and no innate magical abilities whatsoever.

Amphisbaena Venom.name: Amphisbaena Venom
Amphisbaena Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:18]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

Blinding Spittle.name: Blinding Spittle
Blinding Spittle.description: A creature critically hit by an amphisbaena's spit Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Twin Bites.name: Twin Bites
Twin Bites.description: An amphisbaena makes a fangs Strike with each of its heads, each against a different target. Both Strikes count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it has made both attacks.

Katpaskir.name: Katpaskir
Katpaskir.publicNotes: Born of the souls of doomsayers and cult leaders who sought to undermine and unravel reality, katpaskirs are demons of nihilism and unmaking. They pry into the edges of reality, placing themselves into the cracks between realms and scratching away at the composure of existence itself. Katpaskirs have an uncanny sense for locating portals and other planar convergences. They seek to corrupt and expand these gateways, setting them loose to expand on their own or drift across the multiverse. As they do, they slowly contribute to the ultimate unraveling of reality. Katpaskirs often appear as insectile humanoids with multiple arms or legs, each capable of scratching and clawing away at the seams of existence.
Katpaskir.allSaves: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Breach Planar Wards.name: Breach Planar Wards
Breach Planar Wards.description:
Trigger An effect attempts to prevent the katpaskir from using a teleportation effect or from casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.29ytKctjg7qSW2ff]{Summon Fiend}

Effect The katpaskir attempts to counteract the triggering effect (counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+29 #Counteract]]{+29}). The katpaskir automatically fails against an artifact's effect.

Distortion Field.name: Distortion Field
Distortion Field.description: 30 feet. Reality bends and warps on the level of all senses without displacing the katpaskir's actual location. Creatures of the katpaskir's choice who start their turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:37] save or treat the area as greater difficult terrain and uneven ground ([[/act balance dc=20]]{DC 20}). A creature who succeeds still treats the area as difficult terrain. For such creatures, the distance through the aura is doubled for determining range penalty.

Mirrored Summons.name: Mirrored Summons
Mirrored Summons.description:
Trigger A creature within 30 feet that the katpaskir is aware of casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lTDixrrNKaCvLKwX]{Summon Celestial} or otherwise summons a holy creature

Effect The katpaskir casts summon fiend, regaining the daily ability to do so if needed. This effect is automatically sustained as long as the triggering summoning is sustained, for up to 1 minute.

Warp Sense.name: Warp Sense
Warp Sense.description: The katpaskir senses changes in the planar fabric within 1 mile, including any teleportation effect, sensing the direction and distance to the disturbance. If it senses such a disturbance within 500 feet, the katpaskir can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{Scouting Eye} to observe the area without needing line of sight to the location.

Dimensional Ambush.name: Dimensional Ambush
Dimensional Ambush.description: The katpaskir casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Translocate}, then makes a melee Strike that deals three extra dice of damage. This Strike counts as two attacks when calculating the katpaskir's multiple attack penalty.

Magma Scorpion.name: Magma Scorpion
Magma Scorpion.publicNotes:
Whether skittering through Chthonian wastelands or basking in the searing sand of the deepest deserts, magma scorpions have charred carapaces, constantly emitting vision-warping waves of heat.

Destructive manifestations of the Plane of Fire, fire elementals sometimes incorporate burning materials into their being or superheated matter, such as molten rock or searing smoke. In combat, they tend to be aggressive and somewhat reckless. Their attacks can sometimes cause major destruction to the surrounding environment, and many fire elementals seem to enjoy seeing their flames spread far and wide.

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: The magma scorpion ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.

Magma Scorpion Venom.name: Magma Scorpion Venom
Magma Scorpion Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:26]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage (1 round) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Eseneth.name: 埃塞内斯缮魂使 Eseneth
Eseneth.publicNotes:
埃塞内斯缮魂使，通常人称"灵魂缝合师"，是一类不动私情、专职修复受创灵魂的外科医生。它们以专业的效率执行任务，凭空凝聚出由精魂能量构成的大型缝合针，来完成必要的工作。埃塞内斯的外形如纤细、无毛、灰肤的类人生物，面部没有任何特征。其上胸与肩头散布着深色隆起的肉质斑块。

许多招魂者都与骨园的庞大官僚机构有着密切的联系。 很少人追求仁慈、正义或个人利益；他们对法莱斯玛和骨园的职责是至高无上的。然而，个别招魂者以不同的方式解释他们的职责，这可能使他们与凡人之间发生冲突。

Mend Soul.name: 修补灵魂 Mend Soul
Mend Soul.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 埃塞内斯缮魂使为自己或他@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]的一个虚体生物恢复@Damage[25[healing]]HP

Seize Soul.name: 夺取灵魂 Seize Soul
Seize Soul.description:
需求 一个有实体的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]于埃塞内斯缮魂使

效果 埃塞内斯缮魂使试图将灵魂从满足需求的生物体内扯出来。埃塞内斯缮魂使尝试一次运动检定对抗目标的强韧DC。

大成功 埃塞内斯缮魂使抓住目标的灵魂。其肉体被释放并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]2轮。当目标的肉体不再麻痹时，他的灵魂立刻回归并立即醒来。受擒于埃塞内斯缮魂使的灵魂为虚体、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]、拥有等同于目标速度的飞行速度，除此之外与目标的数据完全一致。这灵魂无法攻击，施展法术，尝试任何需要实体身躯才能进行的检定——除了@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]检定（DC38）。灵魂必须一直与肉体间拥有效果线。

成功 如同大成功，但麻痹在1轮后即结束。

失败 目标仍被擒获或束缚，但他的灵魂没有离体。

大失败 擒获或束缚结束。

Shepherd's Touch.name: 牧者之触 Shepherd's Touch
Shepherd's Touch.description: 埃塞内斯缮魂使的打击能如同具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]性能符文的效果一般影响虚体生物，对活物造成@Damage[2d6[void]]伤害，对不死生物造成@Damage[2d6[vitality]]伤害。

Shred Soul.name: 撕裂灵魂 Shred Soul
Shred Soul.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 一个虚体生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]于埃塞内斯缮魂使

效果 埃塞内斯缮魂使对满足需求的生物造成@Damage[(3d10+14)[force]]伤害。

Spirit Grasp.name: 攫取精魂 Spirit Grasp
Spirit Grasp.description: 虽然埃塞内斯缮魂使身为实体生物，但可以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]虚体生物。埃塞内斯缮魂使可用运动技能如常擒拿虚体生物，但无法使用运动技能的其他行动（如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]）来对抗虚体生物。

Rune Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).name: 古符文龙施法者 Rune Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster)
Rune Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).publicNotes: 符文龙天生对符文的力量有着深刻的洞察。大多数符文龙的鳞片上刻有各种符文，它们的身体可以魔法般地增强这些符文的力量。符文龙通常不自己施法，而是依靠它们即兴创造符文的能力来产生所需的效果。符文龙常常把自己的财宝称为图书馆，因为它们的财宝中充满了由不同文化的人们使用多种语言写成的重要历史文献、戏剧、演讲、教科书和法术书。尽管它们通常可以借助魔法说某种语言，但它们更喜欢在讲者的语境中学习语言，以便理解其中隐藏的细微差别和符号中的魔力。

equipment-Common runes of 14th level or.name: 刻在鳞片上的常见符文（14级或更低） Common runes of 14th level or lower etched upon their scales

Magic Sense.name: 魔法感知 Magic Sense
Magic Sense.description: 符文龙能感知到列出范围内所有激活的魔法能力与效果。当符文龙进行搜寻时，它在列出范围内获得4环级侦测魔法法术的效果（此外还获得搜寻的正常好处）。

Runic Scales.name: 符文鳞片 Runic Scales
Runic Scales.description: 符文龙的鳞片作为符文石存在。符文龙不能使用蚀刻在其鳞片上的符文的效果或能力，但它们可以将其转移到适当的物品上。以这种方式向物品转移或从物品上转移一个符文需要1分钟，在此期间符文龙处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]状态。该过程自动完成无需检定，但如果符文龙在此过程中停止或受到打扰，符文将被摧毁。符文龙可以在其鳞片上蚀刻任意数量的符文，但它们通常一次只在鳞片上蚀刻少数符文。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Arcane.name: 对抗奥术的全豁免获得+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Arcane

Canceling Rune.name: 抵消符文 Canceling Rune
Canceling Rune.description:
触发 符文龙成为一个需要豁免的法术的目标

效果 符文龙尝试瓦解法术的基础符文。它尝试反制该法术（反制环级10环级，反制调整值[[/r 1d20+33 #Counteract]]{+33}）。若成功，符文龙不受该法术影响；其他目标正常受到该法术影响。符文龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Canceling Rune]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用抵消符文。

Retributive Rune.name: 惩戒符文 Retributive Rune
Retributive Rune.description:
触发 一个15尺内的生物对符文龙造成伤害

效果 伴随着符文魔法的爆发，符文龙对触发生物使用爆裂符文能力，若符文未自动引爆则立即将其引爆。

Detonating Rune.name: 爆裂符文 Detonating Rune
Detonating Rune.description: 符文龙的打击与能力可以在目标身上留下一个爆裂符文。如果一个生物在已经拥有一个爆裂符文的情况下将要获得另一个爆裂符文，则不会新增一个符文，而是会激活其当前的爆裂符文，消耗该符文并对目标造成@Damage[6d6[untyped]]伤害。爆裂符文的伤害类型与符文龙当前变幻符文的类型一致。生物可以使用一个交互动作移除该符文。如果爆裂符文没有引爆，则在1分钟后消散。

Entangling Rune.name: 束缚符文 Entangling Rune
Entangling Rune.description: 符文龙在60尺内创造一个@Template[type:burst|distance:10]范围的大型陷阱符文。除符文龙外的任何生物进入该区域或在其中结束回合时，会激活符文并受到束缚。该生物必须通过@Check[reflex|dc:41]豁免，否则将被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]1分钟或直到其成功逃脱。该符文每次只能束缚一个生物。符文在生物豁免成功、逃脱成功或1分钟后消散。与符文相邻的生物可以使用一个交互动作来移除符文。

Runic Breath.name: 符文吐息 Runic Breath
Runic Breath.description: 符文龙释放数百枚一触即爆的符文，在@Template[type:cone|distance:50]范围内造成@Damage[17d6[untyped]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:41|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。此能力的伤害类型由变幻符文决定。豁免失败的生物还会受到爆裂符文的影响。符文龙在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Runic Breath]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用符文吐息。

Shifting Runes.name: 变幻符文 Shifting Runes
Shifting Runes.description: 符文龙选择酸蚀，寒冷，电击，火焰或音波伤害类型。蚀刻在其鳞片上的符文随之变幻，形成该能量类型的符文。符文龙获得对该伤害类型的免疫，且其爆裂符文与符文吐息均造成该类型伤害。任何在奥法上受训的生物无需检定即可立即识别蚀刻符文的能量类型。

Trail of Runes.name: 符文踪迹 Trail of Runes
Trail of Runes.description: 符文龙行走并在每个经过的空间留下符文。符文龙可以选择留下爆裂符文或束缚符文。每个符文龙行走过的空间，包括被生物占据的空间，都将获得一个符文。这些符文会在除符文龙外的生物进入该空间或在其中结束回合时自动激活。这些符文可以像正常情况一样被移除或消散。

Improved Push 15 feet.name: 精通推离15尺 Improved Push 15 feet

Gutter Ooze.name: 水沟泥怪 Gutter Ooze
Gutter Ooze.publicNotes: 这些小型的原生质团块被视为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.9InGpxq5xbbHaL9f]的低等"近亲"，每逢降雨便从城市的排水沟渠中涌出，以积聚在街边排水沟的有机碎屑为食。由于它们几乎吞噬一切——卵石、碎玻璃片及其他垃圾——某些城市认为它们带来的益处远大于危害。

Motion Sense.name: 运动感知 Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: 水沟泥怪能通过震动以及空气或水的流动来感知附近的生物。

Slip Up.name: 滑倒 Slip Up
Slip Up.description:
触发 一个相邻生物用近战打击对水沟泥怪造成伤害

Effect 部分水沟泥怪的水状原生质从触发生物脚下喷涌而出。目标必须成功通过一次@Check[reflex|dc:15]豁免，否则将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

Detritus.name: 碎屑 Detritus
Detritus.description: 由于城市水沟中积聚的各种杂物，每当水沟泥怪进行伪足打击时，伤害类型会在钝击、挥砍和穿刺之间随机选择。

Weak Acid.name: 弱酸 Weak Acid
Weak Acid.description: 水沟泥怪的酸蚀伤害只会影响有机物质——不会影响金属、石头或其他无机物。

Hellcat.name: Hellcat
Hellcat.publicNotes:
Hellcats are devious predators native to the fiery pits of Hell. While the fiendish creatures resemble undead skeletal smilodons, bones smoking with heat and dripping with boiling blood, they're actually living hellspawn whose transparent flesh reveals their burning skeleton. A typical hellcat is 9 feet long and weighs 1,000 pounds.

Left to their own devices, hellcats spend their time hunting. As fiendish creatures, they don't need mortal sustenance but devour prey for the sheer pleasure of inflicting pain. They're also far more intelligent than most assume, and they resent being treated as unintelligent animals; those who treat a hellcat thusly might find themselves made into a trophy for its pack, as a hellcat will go to great lengths to coordinate elaborate revenge upon any who fail to show them proper respect.

Though they can't speak, hellcats know Diabolic and can communicate by telepathy with any creature capable of speech. They rarely say much except to whisper threats and acknowledge the orders of their diabolic masters.

Hellcats are quick to retreat if clearly outmatched or up against foes they're unable to reach, but they never forget prey that escapes them.
Hellcat.allSaves: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值

Fiendish Telepathy 100 feet.name: Fiendish Telepathy 100 feet
Fiendish Telepathy 100 feet.description:
This functions as telepathy, except that the hellcat can speak mentally to any creature, regardless of language. This doesn't grant the hellcat the ability to understand what the other creature is thinking, unless that creature also understands Diabolic.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Telepathy]

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的全豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Elusive Terror.name: Elusive Terror
Elusive Terror.description: A hellcat can live within the fears of others and use their dread to hide from sight. The hellcat can [[/act hide]] in the presence of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creatures. If successful, the hellcat becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from frightened creatures as if it moved behind cover or into concealment, but must otherwise Hide normally from non-frightened creatures.

Fearful Attack.name: Fearful Attack
Fearful Attack.description: The hellcat deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creatures.

Hell Pack Mindlink.name: Hell Pack Mindlink
Hell Pack Mindlink.description: The hellcat telepathically links its senses to all other hellcats within 100 feet for 10 minutes. It loses this contact with any hellcat that moves out of a 100-foot radius. While linked to at least one ally, the hellcat can't be flanked and gains a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws.

Menacing Growl.name: Menacing Growl
Menacing Growl.description:
The hellcat produces a low growl to disorient and frighten foes. The hellcat can cause this vocalization to originate from somewhere else within 30 feet. Non-fiends in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] must attempt a @Check[will|dc:25] save. The hellcat can't issue another Menacing Growl for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4}.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: The hellcat Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the hellcat began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, it remains hidden until after the ability's Strike.

Jorogumo.name: Jorogumo
Jorogumo.publicNotes:
Appearing as beautiful, well-dressed humans, jorogumo lurk in the high mountains and prey on travelers, often through words and charm. These cruel creatures can fully change into a giant spider or sprout spider legs from their backs, and they often keep giant spiders as pets. Jorogumo usually eat their prey, but some humanoids meet an even more gruesome fate as living incubators for jorogumo eggs.

When they encounter a tengu, jorogumo fly into a rage and attempt to murder them as quickly as possible, for they insist that tengu can see through their trickery with a mere glance and are immune to their venom, but it isn't clear to outsiders if this is the whole story behind their single-minded hatred. Though most jorogumo are solitary creatures, some worship Norgorber and serve as valuable allies to thieves' guilds following that god's guise as the Gray Master.

Darting Legs.name: Darting Legs
Darting Legs.description:
Requirements The jorogumo has their spider legs extended or has Changed Shape

Trigger The jorogumo is targeted with an attack

Effect The jorogumo raises a leg, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The jorogumo takes on the appearance of any Small or Medium spider. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Jorogumo Venom.name: Jorogumo Venom
Jorogumo Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:32]

Maximum Duration 4 hours

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and stupefied 2 (1 round)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for [[/gmr 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours}

Spider Legs.name: Spider Legs
Spider Legs.description:
Requirements The jorogumo is in humanoid form
